original: “Diṭṭhamaṅgalikā brāhmaṇakaññā”ti jātakaṭṭhakathādīsu āgataṃ, idha pana “seṭṭhidhītā”ti.

original: Vāreyyatthāyāti āvāhatthāya, assāti pesitapuggalassa. Tādisena nīcakulasaṃvattaniyena
analyzed: vāreyya tthāya ati āvāha tthāya assa āti pesita puggalassa tādisena nīca kula saṃvattaniyena

original: kammunā laddhokāsena caṇḍālayoniyaṃ nibbatto.
analyzed: kammunā laddha ukāsena caṇḍāla yoniyam nibbattaḥ

original: Cammageheti cammena chādite gehe. Mātaṅgotvevassa nāmaṃ ahosi jātisamudāgataṃ. Tanti
analyzed: camma geha iti cammena chādite gehe nāmam ahosi jāti samudāgatam tanti

original: ghaṇṭaṃ. Vādento tālanena saddaṃ karonto. Mahāpathaṃ paṭipajji diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya gehadvārasamīpena.
analyzed: ghaṇṭam vādentaḥ tālanena saddam karontaḥ mahāpatham paṭipajji diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya geha dvāra samīpena

original: Tassā veyyāvaccakarā ceva upaṭṭhākamanussā paṭibaddhā ca surāsoṇḍādayo jāṇukapparādīhi sukoṭṭitaṃ koṭṭitabhāvena mucchaṃ āpannattā matoti saññāya chaḍḍesuṃ.
analyzed: tassāḥ veyyāvacca karā ca iva upaṭṭhāka manussā paṭibaddhā ca surāsoṇḍa ādayaḥ jāṇu kappara ādīhi su koṭṭitam koṭṭita bhāvena muccham āpannattā matoti saññāya chaḍḍesuṃ

original: Atha bodhisatto āyuavasesassa atthitāya mandamande vāte vāyante cirena saññaṃ paṭilabhati.
analyzed: atha bodhisattaḥ āyu avasesassa atthitāya mandamande vāte vāyante cirena saññam paṭilabhati

original: Tenāha “mahāpuriso”tiādi. Gehaṅgaṇeti gehassa mahādvārato bahi vivaṭaṅgaṇe. Patitoti
analyzed: tena āha mahā purisaḥ tiādi gehaṅgaṇa iti gehassa mahā dvārataḥ bahi patito ti

original: pātaṃ katvā icchitatthanipphattiṃ antaraṃ katvā anuppavesena nipanno. Diṭṭhamaṅgalikāyāti
analyzed: pātam katvā icchitattha nipphattim antaram katvā an uppavesena nipannaḥ diṭṭha maṅgalikāya ati

original: diṭṭhamaṅgalikākāraṇena.
analyzed: diṭṭha maṅgalikā kāraṇena

original: Yasanti vibhavaṃ kittisaddañca. Candanti candamaṇḍalaṃ, candavimānanti attho. Ucchiṭṭhageheti parehi paribhuttagehe. Maṇḍapeti nagaramajjhe mahāmaṇḍape.
analyzed: vibhavam kittisaddam ca candanti canda maṇḍalam canda vimānanti ucchiṭṭha gehe iti parehi paribhutta gehe maṇḍape iti nagara majjhe mahā maṇḍape

original: Khīramaṇimūlanti khīramūlaṃ, pādesu baddhamaṇimūlañca. Yāvatā vācuggatā pariyattīti
analyzed: khīra maṇi mūlanti khīra mūlam pādesu baddha maṇi mūlam ca yāvatā

original: yattako manussavacīdvārato uggato nikkhanto pavatto, yaṃkiñci vacīmayanti attho.
analyzed: yattakaḥ manussa vacī dvārataḥ uggataḥ nikkhantaḥ pavattaḥ yaṃ kiñci vacīmayanti attho

original: Ākāsaṅgaṇeti vivaṭaṅgaṇe.
analyzed: ākāsaṅgaṇā iti vivaṭaṅgaṇe

original: Dummavāsīti dhūmo dhūsaro, anañjitāmaṇḍitoti adhippāyo. Otallakoti nihīnajjhāsayo,
analyzed: dumma vāsī iti dhūmaḥ dhūsaraḥ an añjita āmaṇḍitaḥ ti adhippāyaḥ otallako ti

original: appānubhāvoti attho. Paṭimuñca kaṇṭheti yāva galavāṭakā pārupitvā. Ko re tuvanti are ko nāma tvaṃ.

original: Pakatanti paṭiyattaṃ nānappakārato abhisaṅkhataṃ. Uttiṭṭhapiṇḍanti antaragharaṃ upagamma

original: ṭhatvā laddhabbapiṇḍaṃ, bhikkhāhāranti attho. Labhatanti lacchatu. Sapākoti mahāsatto

original: jātivasena yathābhūtaṃ attānaṃ āvikaroti.
analyzed: jāti vasena yathābhūtam attānam āvikaroti

original: Atthatthitaṃ saddahatoti samparāyikassa atthassa atthibhāvaṃ saddahantassa. Apehīti apagaccha. Ettoti imasmā ṭhānā. Jammāti lāmaka.
analyzed: attha tthitam saddahato ti samparāyikassa atthassa atthi bhāvam saddahantassa apehi iti apagaccha ettas ti imasmā ṭhānā

original: Anūpakhetteti ajaṅgale udakasampanne khette phalavisesaṃ paccāsīsantā. Etāya saddhāya
analyzed: anūpa khetta iti ajaṅgale udaka sampanne khette phala visesam etāya saddhāya

original: dadāhi dānanti ninnaṃ thalañca pūrento megho viya guṇavante nigguṇe ca dānaṃ dehi,

original: evaṃ dento ca appeva ārādhaye dakkhiṇeyyeti. Dakkhiṇeyyeti sīlādiguṇasamannāgate.

original: Tānīti te brāhmaṇā. Veṇupadarenāti veḷuvilīvena.
analyzed: tāni iti te brāhmaṇāḥ veṇu padarena ati veḷu vilīvena

original: Giriṃ nakhena khaṇasīti pabbataṃ attano nakhena khaṇanto viya ahosi. Ayoti kālalohaṃ. Padahasīti abhibhavasi, attano sarīrena abhibhavanto viya ahosi.
analyzed: girim nakhena khaṇasi iti pabbatam attanaḥ nakhena khaṇantaḥ viya ahosi kālaloham padahasi iti abhibhavasi attanaḥ sarīrena abhibhavantaḥ viya ahosi

original: Āvedhitanti calitaṃ viparivattetvā ṭhitaṃ. Piṭṭhitoti piṭṭhipassena. Bāhuṃ pasāreti

original: na samiñjeti, setāni akkhīni parivattanena kaṇhamaṇḍalassa adissanato.
analyzed: na samiñjeti setāni akkhīni parivattanena kaṇha maṇḍalassa a dissanato

original: Jīvitanti jīvanaṃ.
analyzed: jīvitanti jīvanam

original: Vehāyasanti ākāse. Pathaddhunoti pathabhūtaddhuno viya.
analyzed: ākāse pathaddhunoti viya

original: Saññampi na karotīti “ime kulappasutā”ti saññāmattampi na karoti. Dantakaṭṭhakucchiṭṭhakanti

original: khāditadantakaṭṭhattā vuttaṃ. Etasseva upari patissati appaduṭṭhapadosabhāvato, mahāsattassa

analyzed: na paññāyati andhakāraḥ eva hoti

original: Yakkhāvaṭṭo nu kho ayaṃ kālavipariyāyo. Mahāpaññanti mahantānaṃ paññānaṃ adhiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ.

original: Etassa kathā etasseva upari patissatīti yāhi tena pāramitāparibhāvanasamiddhāhi nānāsamāpattivihāraparipūritāhi

original: pharusavācā pavattitā, sā abhisapi tassa khettavisesabhāvato tassa ca ajjhāsayapharusatāya

original: upari patituṃ na adāsi, upāyena mocesi. Tena vuttaṃ cariyāpiṭake –

original: Tasseva matthake nipati, yogena taṃ pamocayi”nti.

original: 69. Anupubbiṃ kathanti anupubbiyā anupubbaṃ kathetabbakathaṃ, kā pana sā? Dānādikathā.

analyzed: dassana attham sagga anantaram maggaḥ maggam ca kathentena tad adhigama upāya sandassana ttham

original: saggapariyāpannāpi pageva itare sabbepi kāmā nāma bahvādīnavā aniccā addhuvā vipariṇāmadhammāti

original: dassitoti veditabbaṃ.

original: Leṇanti byasanehi paripātiyamānassa olīyanapadeso. Gatīti gantabbaṭṭhānaṃ. Parāyaṇanti

original: 75. Aviññāṇakaṃ dārusākhādimayaṃ. Bahalabahalaṃ pītāvalepanaṃ raṅgajātanti ativiya

original: bahalaṃ pītavaṇṇamañjiṭṭhaādiavalepanarajanaṃ. Ghaṭṭetvā uppāditacchaviṃ, yā raṅgaṃ

original: Raṅgakkhamo rajaniyo. Tenāha “rāgamattaṃ janetī”ti. Anuyoganti codanaṃ. Vīmaṃsanti

original: Sabbampi buddhavacanaṃ catusaccavinimuttaṃ natthi, tañca vīmaṃsiyamānaṃ viññūnaṃ

original: 76. Visayapariññāṇena dahati paṭipakkhe sodhetīti dhīro, svāyamassa dhīrabhāvo sabbaso

original: vīsameva vesaṃ, rāgādīti āha – “vesantarassāti rāgādivīsaṃ taritvā vitaritvā ṭhitassā”ti.

original: Tusitassāti karuṇāyanavasena tusiyā itassa saṃvattassa. Evaṃ sati “muditassā”ti idaṃ

original: Sadevakaṃ lokaṃ saṃsārato nibbānasukhaṃ narati neti pāpetīti naro, nāyakoti attho,

original: Vinetīti vinayo, vinayo eva veneyikoti āha “sattānaṃ vināyakassā”ti. Viññūnaṃ ruciṃ

7. Kukkuravatikasuttavaṇṇanā
analyzed: kukkuravatika sutta vaṇṇanā

analyzed: kattha nibbatti iti kukkuravata samādānam ti kukkura bhāva samādānam ajja paṭṭhāya

analyzed: sassatā tiādīsu sassatā ti sabbakālikaḥ niccaḥ dhuvaḥ a vipariṇāma dhammaḥ ti attho saḥ hi

original: diṭṭhigatikehi lokīyanti ettha puññapāpatabbipākā, sayaṃ vā tabbipākākarādibhāvena
analyzed: diṭṭhigatikehi ettha puñña pāpa tabbipākā sayam vā tad bipāka ākara ādi bhāvena

original: aviyuttehi lokīyatīti lokoti adhippeto. Etena cattāropi sassatavādā dassitā honti.
analyzed: a viyuttehi lokīyati iti etena cattāro api sassata vādāḥ dassitāḥ honti

original: Asassatoti na sassato, anicco addhuvo bhedanadhammoti attho, asassatoti ca sassatabhāvapaṭikkhepena
analyzed: a sassatoti na sassataḥ aniccaḥ addhuvaḥ bhedana dhammo ti attho a sassataḥ ti ca sassata bhāva paṭikkhepena

original: ucchedo dīpitoti sattapi ucchedavādā dassitā honti. Antavāti parivaṭumo paricchinnaparimāṇo,
analyzed: ucchedaḥ dīpito ti satta pi uccheda vādāḥ dassitāḥ honti

original: asabbagatoti attho. Tena “sarīraparimāṇo, aṅguṭṭhaparimāṇo, yavaparimāṇo paramāṇuparimāṇo
analyzed: a sabba gataḥ ti attho tena sarīra parimāṇaḥ aṅguṭṭha parimāṇaḥ yava parimāṇaḥ paramāṇu parimāṇaḥ

original: attā”ti evamādivādā dassitā honti.
analyzed: attā ati evamādi vādāḥ dassitāḥ honti

original: Tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti tathāgato jīvo attā maraṇato imassa kāyassa bhedato paraṃ
analyzed: tathāgataḥ param tathāgataḥ jīvaḥ attā maraṇataḥ imassa kāyassa bhedataḥ param

original: uddhaṃ hoti atthi saṃvijjatīti attho. Etena sassatabhāvamukhena soḷasa saññīvādā,
analyzed: uddham hoti atthi saṃvijjati iti etena sassata bhāva mukhena soḷasa saññīvādā

original: aṭṭha asaññīvādā, aṭṭha ca nevasaññīnāsaññīvādā dassitā honti. Na hotīti natthi na

original: upalabbhati. Etena ucchedavādo dassito hoti. Apica hoti ca na ca hotīti atthi natthi
analyzed: upalabbhati etena uccheda vādaḥ dassitaḥ hoti apica hoti ca na ca hoti iti atthi natthi

original: cāti. Etena ekaccasassatavādo dassito. Neva hoti na na hotīti pana iminā amarāvikkhepavādo
analyzed: ca ati etena ekacca sassata vādaḥ dassitaḥ na iva hoti na na hoti iti pana iminā amarā vikkhepa vādo

original: dassitoti veditabbaṃ. Bhagavatā pana aniyyānikattā anatthasaṃhitāni imāni dassanānīti
analyzed: dassitaḥ ti veditabbam bhagavatā pana aniyyānika ttā anattha saṃhitāni imāni dassanāni iti

original: tāni na byākatāni, taṃ abyākaraṇaṃ sandhāyāha ayaṃ thero “taṃ me na ruccatī”ti. Sikkhaṃ
analyzed: tāni na byākatāni tam a byākaraṇam sandhāya āha ayam thero tam me na ruccati iti sikkham

original: paṭikkhipitvā yathāsamādinnasikkhaṃ pahāya.
analyzed: paṭikkhipitvā yathā samādinna sikkham pahāya

original: 125. Tvaṃ neva yācakoti ahaṃ bhante bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ carissāmītiādinā. Na yācitakoti tvaṃ mālukyaputta mayi brahmacariyaṃ carātiādinā.
analyzed: tvam na iva aham bhante bhagavati brahmacariyam carissāmi itiādinā na tvam mālukyaputta mayi brahmacariyam cara atiādinā

original: 126. Parasenāya ṭhitena purisena. Bahalalepanenāti bahalavilepanena. Mahāsupiyādi
analyzed: para senāya ṭhitena purisena bahala lepanena ati bahala vilepanena mahā supiya ādi

original: sabbo muduhidako veṇuviseso saṇho. Maruvāti makaci. Khīrapaṇṇinoti khīrapaṇṇiyā,
analyzed: sabbaḥ muduhidakaḥ veṇu visesaḥ saṇhaḥ maruvā ti khīrapaṇṇinā iti khīrapaṇṇiyā

original: yassā chindanamatte paṇṇe khīraṃ paggharati. Gacchanti gacchato jātaṃ sayaṃjātagumbato

original: gahitanti adhippāyo. Sithilahanu nāma dattā kaṇṇo pataṅgo. Etāya diṭṭhiyā sati na

original: hotīti “sassato loko”ti etāya diṭṭhiyā sati maggabrahmacariyavāso na hoti, taṃ pahāya eva pattabbato.
analyzed: hoti iti sassataḥ loko ti etāya diṭṭhiyā sati magga brahmacariya vāsaḥ na hoti tam pahāya eva pattabbato

original: 127. Attheva jātītiādinā etā diṭṭhiyo paccekampi saṃsāraparibrūhanā kaṭasivaḍḍhanā nibbānavibandhanāti dasseti.
analyzed: attha iva jātī iti ādinā etāḥ diṭṭhiyaḥ paccekam pi saṃsāra paribrūhanā kaṭasivaḍḍhanā nibbāna vibandhanā ti dasseti

original: 128. Tasmātihāti idaṃ aṭṭhāne uddhaṭaṃ, ṭhāneyeva pana “vuttapaṭipakkhanayena veditabba”nti
analyzed: tasmā atihā ti idam aṭṭhāne uddhaṭam ṭhāne iya iva pana vutta paṭipakkha nayena veditabbanti

original: imassa parato katvā saṃvaṇṇetabbaṃ. Attano phalena araṇīyato anugantabbato kāraṇampi

original: Pubbapadaṭṭhānanti paṭhamārambho. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
analyzed: pubba padaṭṭhānam ti paṭhama ārambhaḥ sesam su viññeyyam eva

original: Cūḷamālukyasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.
analyzed: cūḷamālukya sutta vaṇṇanāya līnattha ppakāsanā samattā

original: 4. Mahāmālukyasuttavaṇṇanā
129. Oraṃ vuccati kāmadhātu, tattha pavattiyā saṃvattanato oraṃ bhajantīti orambhāgiyāni,
analyzed: oram vuccati kāmadhātu tattha pavattiyā saṃvattanataḥ oram bhajanti iti orambhāgiyāni

original: heṭṭhimamaggavajjhatāya orambhāge heṭṭhākoṭṭhāse bhajantīti orambhāgiyāni ka-kārassa
analyzed: heṭṭhima magga vajjhatāya orambhāge heṭṭhā koṭṭhāse bhajanti iti orambhāgiyāni kakārassa

original: ya-kāraṃ katvā. Tenāha “heṭṭhākoṭṭhāsikānī”tiādi. Kammunā hi vaṭṭena ca dukkhaṃ saṃyojentīti
analyzed: yakāram katvā tena āha heṭṭhā koṭṭhāsikāni itiādi kammunā hi vaṭṭena ca dukkham saṃyojenti iti

original: saṃyojanāni, orambhāgiyasaññitāni saṃyojanāni yassa appahīnāni, tasseva vaṭṭadukkhaṃ.
analyzed: saṃyojanāni orambhāgiya saññitāni saṃyojanāni yassa appahīnāni tassa iva vaṭṭa dukkham

original: Yassa pana tāni pahīnāni, tassa taṃ natthīti. Appahīnatāya anusetīti ariyamaggena
analyzed: yassa pana tāni pahīnāni tassa tam natthi iti appahīna tāya anuseti iti ariya maggena

original: asamucchinnatāya kāraṇalābhe sati uppajjati, appahīnabhāvena anuseti. Anusayamāno
analyzed: asamucchinnatāya kāraṇa lābhe sati uppajjati appahīna bhāvena anuseti anusayamānaḥ

original: saṃyojanaṃ nāma hotīti anusayattaṃ pharitvā pavattamāno pāpadhammo yathāvuttenatthena
analyzed: saṃyojanam nāma hoti iti pharitvā pavattamānaḥ pāpa dhammaḥ yathāvuttena atthena

original: saṃyojanaṃ nāma hoti. Etena yadi pana anusayato saṃyojanaṃ pavattaṃ, tathāpi ye te
analyzed: saṃyojanam nāma hoti etena yadi pana anusayato saṃyojanam pavattam tathā api ye te

original: kāmarāgādayo “anusayā”ti vuccanti, teyeva bandhanaṭṭhena saṃyojanānīti dasseti.
analyzed: kāma rāga ādayaḥ anusayā ti vuccanti teyeva bandhana ṭṭhena saṃyojanāni iti dasseti

original: Evaṃ santepīti yadeva orambhāgiyasaṃyojanaṃ bhagavatā pucchitaṃ, tadeva therenapi
analyzed: evam santaḥ ipi iti yat eva orambhāgiya saṃyojanam bhagavatā pucchitam tat eva therena api

original: vissajjitaṃ, tathāpi ayaṃ laddhi sannissayā. Tattha dosāropanāti dassetuṃ “tassa
analyzed: vissajjitam tathā api ayam laddhi sannissayā tattha dosa āropanā ti dassetum tassa

original: vāde”tiādi vuttaṃ. Samudācārakkhaṇeyevāti pavattikkhaṇe eva. Na hi sabbe vattamānā
analyzed: vāda itiādi vuttam samudācāra kkhaṇe yeva āti pavatti kkhaṇe eva na hi sabbe vattamānā

original: kilesā saṃyojanatthaṃ pharantīti adhippāyo. Tenāti tena kāraṇena, tathāladdhikattāti
analyzed: kilesā saṃyojana attham pharanti iti adhippāyaḥ tena ati tena kāraṇena tathā laddhika ttā ati

original: attho. Cintesi “dhammaṃ desessāmī”ti yojanā. Attano dhammatāyevāti ajjhattāsayeneva.
analyzed: attho cintesi dhammam desessāmi iti yojanā attanaḥ dhamma tāya iva ati ajjhatta āsayena iva

original: Visaṃvāditāti satthu cittassa anārādhanena vivecitā. Evamakāsi evaṃ dhammaṃ desāpesi.
analyzed: visaṃvāditā ati satthu cittassa anārādhanena vivecitā evam akāsi evam dhammam desāpesi

original: 130. Sakkāyadiṭṭhipariyuṭṭhitenāti pariyuṭṭhānasamatthasakkāyadiṭṭhikena. Tathābhūtañca
analyzed: sakkāya diṭṭhi pariyuṭṭhitena ati pariyuṭṭhāna samattha sakkāya diṭṭhikena tathābhūtam ca

original: cittaṃ tāya diṭṭhiyā vigayhitaṃ ajjhotthaṭañca nāma hotīti āha “gahitena abhibhūtenā”ti.
analyzed: cittam tāya diṭṭhiyā vigayhitam ajjhotthaṭam ca nāma hoti iti āha gahitena abhibhūtena ati

original: Diṭṭhinissaraṇaṃ nāma dassanamaggo tena samucchinditabbato, so pana nibbānaṃ āgamma
analyzed: diṭṭhi nissaraṇam nāma dassana maggo tena samucchinditabbataḥ saḥ pana nibbānam āgamma

original: taṃ samucchindati, tasmā vuttaṃ “diṭṭhinissaraṇaṃ nibbāna”nti. Avinoditā anīhaṭāti
analyzed: tam samucchindati tasmai vuttam diṭṭhi nissaraṇam nibbānanti a vinoditā anīhaṭā ati

original: padadvayenapi samucchedavasena appahīnattaṃyeva vadati. Aññaṃ saṃyojanaṃ añño anusayoti
analyzed: pada dvayena api samuccheda vasena vadati aññam saṃyojanam aññaḥ anusayaḥ ti

original: vadanti, sahabhāvo nāma aññena hoti. Na hi tadeva tena sahāti vuccatīti tesaṃ adhippāyo.
analyzed: vadanti sahabhāvaḥ nāma aññena hoti na hi tat eva tena saha ati vuccati iti tesam adhippāyaḥ

original: Aññenāti atthato aññena. Avatthāmattato yadipi avayavavinimutto samudāyo natthi,
analyzed: aññena ati atthataḥ aññena avatthā mattataḥ yadi pi avayava vinimuttaḥ samudāyaḥ natthi

original: avayavo pana samudāyo na hotīti so samudāyato añño evāti sakkā vattunti yathāvuttassa
analyzed: avayavaḥ pana samudāyaḥ na hoti iti so samudāyataḥ aññaḥ eva ati sakkā vattunti yathā vuttassa

original: parihārassa appāṭihīrakataṃ āsaṅkitvā pakkhantaraṃ āsallitaṃ “athāpi siyā”tiādinā.
analyzed: parihārassa appāṭihīrakatam āsaṅkitvā pakkhantaram āsallitam atha api siyā tiādinā

original: Pakkhantarehi parihārā hontīti yathāvuttañāyenapi añño puriso athāpi siyā, ayaṃ panettha
analyzed: pakkha antarehi parihārāḥ honti iti yathāvutta ñāyena api aññaḥ puriso atha api siyā ayam pana ittha

original: añño dosoti āha “yadi tadevā”tiādi. Athāpi siyā tuyhaṃ yadi parivitakko īdiso yadi
analyzed: aññaḥ doso ti āha yadi tat eva atiādi atha api siyā tuyham yadi parivitakkaḥ īdisaḥ yadi

original: tadeva saṃyojanantiādi. Imamatthaṃ sandhāyāti paramatthato so eva kileso saṃyojanamanusayo
analyzed: tat eva saṃyojana nti ādi imam attham sandhāya ati paramatthato saḥ eva kileso saṃyojanam anusayo

original: ca, bandhanatthaappahīnatthānaṃ pana attheva bhedoti imamatthaṃ sandhāya.
analyzed: ca bandhana ttha appahīna tthānam pana atthā iva bhedaḥ ti imam attham sandhāya

original: 132. Tacacchedo viya samāpatti kilesānaṃ samāpattivikkhambhanassa sāracchedassa anusayassa
analyzed: taca chedaḥ viya samāpatti kilesānam samāpatti vikkhambhanassa sāra chedassa anusayassa

original: dūrabhāvato. Pheggucchedo viya vipassanā tassa āsannabhāvato. Evarūpā puggalāti abhāvitasaddhādibalatāya
analyzed: dūra bhāvataḥ pheggu chedaḥ viya vipassanā tassa āsanna bhāvataḥ evarūpā abhāvita saddhā ādi bala tāya

original: dubbalanāmakāyā puggalā, yesaṃ sakkāyanirodhāya…pe… nādhimuccati. Evaṃ daṭṭhabbāti
analyzed: dubbala nāmakāyā puggalāḥ yesam na adhimuccati evam daṭṭhabbā ati

original: yathā so dubbalako puriso, evaṃ daṭṭhabbo so puriso gaṅgāpāraṃ viya sakkāyapāraṃ
analyzed: yathā saḥ dubbalakaḥ purisaḥ evam daṭṭhabbaḥ saḥ purisaḥ gaṅgā pāram viya sakkāya pāram

original: gantuṃ asamatthattā. Vuttavipariyāyena sukkapakkhassa attho veditabbo.
analyzed: gantum asamattha ttā vutta vipariyāyena sukka pakkhassa atthaḥ veditabbaḥ

original: 133. Upadhivivekenāti iminā upadhivivekāti karaṇe nissakkananti dasseti, upadhivivekāti
analyzed: upadhi vivekena ati iminā upadhi vivekā ati karaṇe nissakkana nti dasseti upadhi vivekā ati

original: vā hetumhi nissakkavacanassa upadhivivekenāti hetumhi karaṇavacanena pañcakāmaguṇaviveko
analyzed: vā hetumhi nissakka vacanassa upadhi vivekena ati hetumhi karaṇa vacanena pañca kāmaguṇa viveko

original: kathito. Kāmaguṇāpi hi upadhīyati ettha dukkhanti upadhīti vuccantīti. Thinamiddhapaccayā
analyzed: kathitaḥ kāma guṇā api hi upadhīyati ettha dukkhanti upadhi iti vuccanti iti thinamiddha paccayā

original: kāyavijambhitādibhedaṃ kāyālasiyaṃ. Tatthāti antosamāpattiyaṃ samāpattiabbhantare
analyzed: kāya vijambhita ādi bhedam kāyālasiyam tattha ati antosamāpattiyam samāpatti abbhantare

original: jātaṃ. Taṃ pana samāpattipariyāpannampi apariyāpannampīti tadubhayaṃ dassetuṃ “antosamāpattikkhaṇeyevā”tiādi
analyzed: jātam tam pana samāpatti pariyāpannam pi apariyāpannam pi iti tat ubhayam dassetum antar samāpatti khaṇe iya iva ātiādi

original: vuttaṃ. Rūpādayo dhammeti rūpavedanādike pañcakkhandhadhamme. Na niccatoti iminā
analyzed: vuttam rūpa ādayaḥ dhamme iti rūpa vedanā ādike pañca kkhandha dhamme na niccatas ti iminā

original: niccapaṭikkhepato tesaṃ aniccatamāha. Tato eva udayavayantato vipariṇāmato tāvakālikato
analyzed: nicca paṭikkhepataḥ tesam anicca tam āha tatas eva udaya vayantataḥ vipariṇāmataḥ tāvakālikato

original: ca te aniccāti jotitaṃ hoti. Yañhi niccaṃ na hoti, taṃ udayabbayaparicchinnaṃ jarāya
analyzed: ca te aniccā ati jotitam hoti yat hi niccam na hoti tam udaya bbaya paricchinnam jarāya

original: maraṇena cāti dvedhā vipariṇataṃ ittarakhaṇameva ca hoti. Na sukhatoti iminā sukhapaṭikkhepato
analyzed: maraṇena ca ati dvedhā vipariṇatam ittara khaṇam eva ca hoti na sukhato ti iminā sukha paṭikkhepato

original: tesaṃ dukkhatamāha, ato eva abhiṇhaṃ paṭipīḷanato dukkhavatthuto ca te dukkhāti jotitaṃ
analyzed: tesam dukkha tam āha atas eva abhiṇham paṭipīḷanato dukkha vatthuto ca te dukkha ati jotitam

original: hoti. Udayabbayavantatāya hi te abhiṇhaṃ paṭipīḷanato nirantaradukkhatāya dukkhasseva
analyzed: hoti udaya bbayavanta tāya hi te abhiṇham paṭipīḷanataḥ nirantara dukkha tāya dukkhassa iva

original: ca adhiṭṭhānabhūtāti. Paccayayāpanīyatāya rogamūlatāya ca rogato. Dukkhatāsūlayogitāya
analyzed: ca adhiṭṭhāna bhūtā ati paccaya yāpanīya tāya roga mūla tāya ca rogataḥ dukkha tā sūla yogi tāya

original: kilesāsucipaggharaṇato uppādajarābhaṅgehi uddhumātapakkabhijjanato ca gaṇḍato. Pīḷājananato
analyzed: uppāda jarā bhaṅgehi ca gaṇḍataḥ pīḷā jananataḥ

original: antotudanato dunnīharaṇato ca avaddhiāvahato aghavatthuto ca aserībhāvato ābādhapadaṭṭhānatāya
analyzed: antotudanataḥ dunnīharaṇataḥ ca avaddhi āvahataḥ agha vatthutaḥ ca a serībhāvataḥ ābādha padaṭṭhāna tāya

original: ca ābādhato. Avasavattanato avidheyyatāya parato. Byādhijarāmaraṇehi palujjanīyatāya
analyzed: ca ābādhataḥ a vidheyya tāya paratas byādhi jarā maraṇehi palujjanīya tāya

original: palokato. Sāmīnivāsīkārakavedakaadhiṭṭhāyakavirahato suññato. Attapaṭikkhepaṭṭhena
analyzed: palokato sāmīnivāsīkāraka vedaka adhiṭṭhāyaka virahato suññataḥ atta paṭikkhepa ṭṭhena

original: anattato, rūpādidhammāpi na ettha attā hontīti anattā, evaṃ ayampi na attā hotīti
analyzed: anattataḥ rūpa ādi dhammā api na ettha attā honti iti anattā evam ayam pi na attā hoti iti

original: anattā. Tena abyāpārato nirīhato tucchato anattāti dīpitaṃ hoti. Lakkhaṇattayameva
analyzed: anattā tena a byāpārataḥ nirīhataḥ tucchataḥ anattā ati dīpitam hoti lakkhaṇattayam eva

original: avabodhatthaṃ ekādasahi padehi vibhajitvā gahitanti dassetuṃ “tatthā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: avabodha attham ekādasahi padehi vibhajitvā gahitanti dassetum tattha atiādi vuttam

original: Antosamāpattiyanti samāpattīnaṃ sahajātatāya samāpattīnaṃ abbhantare. Cittaṃ paṭisaṃharatīti
analyzed: antosamāpattiyanti samāpattīnam sahajāta tāya samāpattīnam abbhantare cittam paṭisaṃharati iti

original: tappaṭibaddhachandarāgādiupakkilesavikkhambhanena vipassanācittaṃ paṭisaṃharati.
analyzed: tad paṭibaddha chanda rāga ādi upakkilesa vikkhambhanena vipassanā cittam paṭisaṃharati

original: Tenāha “mocetī”ti. Savanavasenāti “sabbasaṅkhārasamatho”tiādinā savanavasena. Thutivasenāti
analyzed: tena āha moca iti iti savana vasena ati sabba saṅkhāra samatha uti ādinā savana vasena thuti vasena ati

original: tatheva thomanāvasena guṇato saṃkittanavasena. Pariyattivasenāti tassa dhammassa

original: na tassa vasena ubhatobhāgavimutto hotīti vuttovāyamattho. Arūpajjhānesu pana ekasmimpi
analyzed: na tassa vasena ubhatobhāga vimutto hoti iti vuttā uva ayam attho arūpa jhānesu pana ekasmim pi

original: sati ubhatobhāgavimuttoyeva nāma hoti. Tena hi aṭṭhavimokkhekadesena taṃnāmadānasamatthena
analyzed: sati ubhatobhāga vimuttā yā iva nāma hoti tena hi aṭṭha vimokkha ekadesena tad nāma dāna samatthena

original: aṭṭhavimokkhalābhītveva vuccati. Samudāye hi pavatto vohāro avayavepi dissati yathā
analyzed: aṭṭha vimokkha lābhī itvā iva vuccati samudāye hi pavattaḥ vohāraḥ avayave pi dissati yathā

original: “sattisayo”ti. Pāḷīti abhidhammapāḷi. Etthāti etissaṃ paññāvimuttikathāyaṃ. Aṭṭhavimokkhapaṭikkhepavasenevāti
analyzed: satti sayaḥ ti pāḷi iti abhidhamma pāḷi ettha ati etissam paññā vimutti kathā ayam aṭṭha vimokkha paṭikkhepa vasena iva āti

original: avadhāraṇena idhāpi paṭikkhepavaseneva āgatabhāvaṃ dasseti. Tenāha “kāyena phusitvā viharatī”ti.
analyzed: avadhāraṇena idha api paṭikkhepa vasena iva āgata bhāvam dasseti tena āha kāyena phusitvā viharati iti

original: Phuṭṭhantaṃ sacchikarotīti phuṭṭhānaṃ anto phuṭṭhanto, phuṭṭhānaṃ arūpajjhānānaṃ
analyzed: phuṭṭhantam sacchikaroti iti phuṭṭhānam antaḥ phuṭṭhantaḥ phuṭṭhānam arūpa jhānānam

original: anantaro kāloti adhippāyo. Accantasaṃyoge cetaṃ upayogavacanaṃ, phuṭṭhānantarakālameva
analyzed: anantaraḥ kālo ti adhippāyaḥ upayoga vacanam phuṭṭha anantara kālam eva

original: sacchikaroti sacchikātabbopāyenāti vuttaṃ hoti. Bhāvanapuṃsakaṃ vā etaṃ “ekamantaṃ
analyzed: sacchikaroti sacchikātabba upāyena iti vuttam hoti bhāva napuṃsakam vā etam ekam antam

original: nisīdī”tiādīsu viya. Yo hi arūpajjhānena rūpakāyato nāmakāyekadesato ca vikkhambhanavimokkhena

original: vimutto, tena nirodhasaṅkhāto vimokkho ālocito pakāsito viya hoti, na pana kāyena
analyzed: vimuttaḥ tena nirodha saṅkhātaḥ vimokkhaḥ ālocitaḥ pakāsitaḥ viya hoti na pana kāyena

original: sacchikato, nirodhaṃ pana ārammaṇaṃ katvā ekaccesu āsavesu khepitesu tena so sacchikato
analyzed: sacchikataḥ nirodham pana ārammaṇam katvā ekaccesu āsavesu khepitesu tena so sacchikataḥ

original: hoti, tasmā so sacchikātabbaṃ nirodhaṃ yathāālocitaṃ nāmakāyena sacchikarotīti “kāyasakkhī”ti

analyzed: vuccati na tu vimuttaḥ ti ekaccānam āsavānam a parikkhīṇa ttā tena āha jhāna phassam

original: paṭhamaṃ phusati, pacchā nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikarotī”ti. Ayaṃ catunnaṃ arūpasamāpattīnaṃ
analyzed: paṭhamam phusati pacchā nirodham nibbānam sacchikaroti iti ayam catunnam arūpa samāpattīnam

original: hoti. Tena vuttaṃ abhidhammaṭīkāyaṃ “kāyasakkhimhipi eseva nayo”ti.

original: Diṭṭhantaṃ pattoti dassanasaṅkhātassa sotāpattimaggañāṇassa anantaraṃ pattoti vuttaṃ

original: hoti. “Diṭṭhattā patto”tipi pāṭho. Etena catusaccadassanasaṅkhātāya diṭṭhiyā nirodhassa

original: pattataṃ dīpeti. Tenāha “dukkhā saṅkhārā, sukho nirodhoti ñātaṃ hotī”ti. Tattha paññāyāti
analyzed: dīpeti tena āha dukkhā saṅkhārā sukhaḥ nirodho ti ñātam hoti iti tattha paññāyāti

analyzed: magga paññāya paṭhama phala ṭṭhataḥ yāva aggamagga ṭṭhā tāva diṭṭhippatto tena āha saḥ api

original: kāyasakkhi viya chabbidho hotī”ti. Yathā pana paññāvimutto pañcavidho vutto, evaṃ
analyzed: kāya sakkhi viya chabbidhaḥ hoti iti yathā pana paññā vimuttaḥ pañcavidhaḥ vuttaḥ evam

original: ayampi sukkhavipassako, catūhi rūpajjhānehi vuṭṭhāya diṭṭhippattabhāvappattā cattāro

original: cāti pañcavidho hotīti veditabbo. Saddhāvimuttepi eseva nayo. Idaṃ dukkhanti ettakaṃ

analyzed: dukkham naḥ itas uddham dukkhanti yathābhūtam pajānāti iti ṭhapetvā taṇham upādāna khandha pañcakam

original: nānakkhaṇe saccavavatthānaṃ dassitaṃ. Idāni taṃ ekakkhaṇe dassetuṃ “tathāgatappaveditā”tiādi
analyzed: nānā khaṇe sacca vavatthānam dassitam idāni tam eka kkhaṇe dassetum tathāgata ppaveditā atiādi

original: vuttaṃ, tassattho āgamissati.
analyzed: vuttam tassa atthaḥ āgamissati

original: hoti. Saddhāvimuttoti vā saddhāya adhimuttoti attho. Vuttanayenevāti “sotāpattiphala”ntiādinā

original: bhāsitattā”ti evaṃ saddahantassa. Yasmā panassa aniccānupassanādīhi niccasaññāpahānavasena

analyzed: vacanena āgamanīya paṭipadā nānattena saddhā vimutta diṭṭhi ppattānam paññā nānattam hoti iti

original: pāpuṇātīti sanniṭṭhānaṃ kata”nti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: pāpuṇāti iti sanniṭṭhānam katan ti vuttam

original: 183. Ādikenevāti paṭhameneva. Anupubbasikkhāti anupubbeneva pavattasikkhāya. Tenāha
analyzed: ādikena iva āti paṭhamena iva anupubba sikkhā ati anupubbena iva pavatta sikkhāya tena āha

analyzed: assa adhippāyam muñcitvā akkhare tāva dosam dassento ti

original: Paribbājako pana yaṃ sandhāya “sabbaṃ me nakkhamatī”ti mayā vuttaṃ, “ayaṃ so”ti yathāvuttadosapariharaṇatthaṃ

analyzed: satto puriso puggalaḥ ti ādinā voharati na pana itas bāhirakāḥ viya abhinivisati tena āha

original: “aparāmasanto”ti. Kañci dhammanti rūpādīsu ekaṃ dhammampi. Parāmāsaggāhena aggaṇhantoti
analyzed: a parāmasanto ti kañci dhammanti rūpa ādīsu ekam dhammam pi parāmāsa ggāhena aggaṇhanto ti

original: “nicca”ntiādinā, “etaṃ mamā”tiādinā ca dhammasabhāvaṃ atikkamitvā parato āmasitvā
analyzed: niccanti ādinā etam mama ati ādinā ca dhamma sabhāvam atikkamitvā paratas āmasitvā

original: gahaṇena aggaṇhanto.
analyzed: gahaṇena aggaṇhanto

original: Katāvīti katakicco. So vadeyyāti khīṇāsavo bhikkhu ahaṅkāramamaṅkāresu sabbaso samucchinnesupi
analyzed: katāvī iti kata kicco so vadeyya ati khīṇa āsavaḥ bhikkhu ahaṅkāra mamaṅkāresu sabbaso samucchinnesu pi

original: ahaṃ vadāmīti vadeyya. Tattha ahanti niyakajjhattasantāne. Mamanti tassa santakabhūte
analyzed: aham vadāmi iti vadeyya tattha aham ti niyaka jjhatta santāne tassa santaka bhūte

original: vatthusmiṃ lokaniruḷhe. Samaññanti tattha sukusalatāya loke samaññā kusalo viditvā.
analyzed: vatthusmim loka niruḷhe samaññanti tattha su kusala tāya loke samaññā kusalaḥ viditvā

original: Vohāramattenāti kevalaṃ paccekabuddho hutvā mahābodhipāramiyo pūretuṃ asakkonto sāvako
analyzed: vohāra mattena ati kevalam paccekabuddhaḥ hutvā mahā bodhipāramiyo pūretum a sakkonto sāvako

original: hutvā desavohāramattena na appahīnataṇho viya andhaputhujjano abhinivesanavasena.
analyzed: hutvā desa vohāra mattena na appahīna taṇhaḥ viya andha puthujjanaḥ abhinivesana vasena

original: 206. Sassatādīsūti sassatābhinivesādīsu. Tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānanti niddhāraṇe sāmivacanaṃ.
analyzed: sassata ādīsu iti sassata abhinivesa ādīsu tesam tesam dhammānam nti niddhāraṇe sāmi vacanam

original: Sassataṃ abhiññāyāti sassatadiṭṭhiṃ samudayato atthaṅgamato assādato nissaraṇato
analyzed: sassatam abhiññāyāti sassata diṭṭhim samudayataḥ atthaṅgamataḥ assādataḥ nissaraṇataḥ

original: abhivisiṭṭhāya paññāya paṭivijjhitvā. Pahānanti accantappahānaṃ samucchedaṃ. Rūpassa
analyzed: abhivisiṭṭhāya paññāya paṭivijjhitvā pahānanti accanta ppahānam samucchedam rūpassa

original: pahānanti rūpassa tappaṭibaddhasaññojanappahānena pahānaṃ. Anuppādanirodhena niruddhehi
analyzed: pahānam ti rūpassa tad paṭibaddha saññojana ppahānena pahānam anuppāda nirodhena niruddhehi

original: āsavehi aggahetvāva cittaṃ vimucci. “Āsavehi cittaṃ vimuccī”ti ettha kiñcipi aggahetvā
analyzed: āsavehi aggahetvā ava cittam vimucci āsavehi cittam vimucci iti ettha kiñcipi aggahetvā

original: asesetvā. Soḷasa paññāti mahāpaññādikā soḷasa paññā. Caturaṅgasamannāgatoti puṇṇauposathadivasatā,
analyzed: a sesetvā soḷasa paññā ti mahāpaññā ādikā soḷasa paññā catur aṅga samannāgataḥ ti puṇṇa auposatha divasa tā

original: kenaci anāmantitameva anekasatānaṃyeva anekasahassānaṃ vā bhikkhūnaṃ sannipatitatā,
analyzed: kenacid an āmantitam eva aneka satānam yeva aneka sahassānam vā bhikkhūnam sannipatita tā

original: sabbesaṃ ehibhikkhubhāvena upasampannatā, chaḷabhiññatā cāti. Tenāha “tatrimāni aṅgānī”tiādi.
analyzed: sabbesam ehi bhikkhu bhāvena upasampanna tā chaḍabhiñña tā ca ati tena āha tatra imāni aṅgāni itiādi

original: Yaṃ panettha atthato avibhattaṃ, taṃ suviññeyyameva.
analyzed: yam pana ittha atthataḥ a vibhattam tam su viññeyyam eva

original: Dīghanakhasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.
analyzed: dīghanakha sutta vaṇṇanāya līnattha ppakāsanā samattā

original: 5. Māgaṇḍiyasuttavaṇṇanā
207. Dve māgaṇḍiyāti dve māgaṇḍiyanāmakā. Devagabbhasadisanti devānaṃ vasanaovarakasadisaṃ.
analyzed: dve māgaṇḍiyā ati dve māgaṇḍiya nāmakā

original: Etaṃ vuttanti “bhāradvājagottassa brāhmaṇassa agyāgāre tiṇasanthārake”ti etaṃ vuttaṃ.
analyzed: etam vuttam ti bhāradvāja gottassa brāhmaṇassa agya āgāre tiṇa santhāraka iti etam vuttam

original: Na kevalaṃ taṃ divasamevāti yaṃ divasaṃ māgaṇḍiyo paribbājako tiṇasanthārakaṃ paññattaṃ,
analyzed: na kevalam tam divasam eva ati yam divasam māgaṇḍiyaḥ paribbājako tiṇa santhārakam paññattam

original: na kevalaṃ taṃ divasameva bhagavā yenaññataro vanasaṇḍo, tenupasaṅkamīti yojanā.
analyzed: na kevalam tam divasam eva bhagavā yena aññataraḥ vana saṇḍo tena upasaṅkami iti yojanā

original: Gāmūpacāreti gāmasamīpe. Saññāṇaṃ katvāti saññāṇaṃ katvā viya. Na hi bhagavato tassa
analyzed: gāma upacāra iti gāma samīpe saññāṇam katvā ati saññāṇam katvā viya na hi bhagavataḥ tassa

original: saññāṇakaraṇe payojanaṃ atthi.
analyzed: saññāṇa karaṇe payojanam atthi

original: Samaṇaseyyānurūpanti samaṇassa anucchavikā seyyā. Pāsaṃsattho hi ayaṃ rūpa-saddo.
analyzed: samaṇa seyyā anurūpanti samaṇassa anucchavikā seyyā pāsaṃsatthaḥ hi ayam rūpa saddo

original: Tenāha “imaṃ tiṇasanthāraka”ntiādi. Anākiṇṇoti viluḷito aghaṭṭito. Hatthapādasīsehi
analyzed: tena āha imam tiṇa santhāraka nti ādi an ākiṇṇaḥ ti viluḷitaḥ a ghaṭṭitaḥ hattha pāda sīsehi

original: tattha tattha pahaṭena na calito abhinno, acalitattā eva abhinnaṃ attharaṇaṃ. Paricchinditvā
analyzed: tattha tattha pahaṭena na calitaḥ abhinnaḥ eva abhinnam attharaṇam paricchinditvā

original: paññatto viyāti ayaṃ chekena cittakārena cintetvā tulikāya paricchinnalekhāya paricchinditvā
analyzed: paññattaḥ viyāti ayam chekena cittakārena cintetvā tulikāya paricchinna lekhāya paricchinditvā

original: likhitā cittakataseyyā viya. Bhūnaṃ vuccati vaḍḍhitaṃ, taṃ hantīti bhūnahuno. Tenāha
analyzed: likhitā cittakata seyyā viya bhūnam vuccati vaḍḍhitam tam hanti iti tena āha

original: “hatavaḍḍhino”ti. Taṃ panāyaṃ cakkhādīsu saṃvaravidhānaṃ vaḍḍhihananaṃ maññati. Tenāha
analyzed: hata vaḍḍhino ti tam pana ayam cakkha ādīsu saṃvara vidhānam vaḍḍhi hananam maññati tena āha

original: “mariyādakārakassā”ti. Brūhetabbanti uḷāravisayūpahārena vaḍḍhetabbaṃ pīṇetabbaṃ.
analyzed: mariyāda kārakassa ati uḷāra visaya upahārena vaḍḍhetabbam pīṇetabbam

original: Taṃ pana ananubhūtānubhavanena hotīti āha “adiṭṭhaṃ dakkhitabba”nti. Anubhūtaṃ pana
analyzed: tam pana ananubhūta anubhavanena hoti iti āha adiṭṭham dakkhitabbanti anubhūtam pana

original: apaṇītaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ “diṭṭhaṃ samatikkamitabba”nti. Sesavāresupi eseva nayo. Paramadiṭṭhadhammanibbānavādī
analyzed: apaṇītam hoti iti vuttam diṭṭham samatikkamitabbanti sesa vāresu pi esa eva nayaḥ parama diṭṭhadhamma nibbāna vādī

original: kiresa paribbājako, tasmā evaṃ chasu dvāresu vaḍḍhiṃ paññapeti. Yasmā yaṃ channampi
analyzed: paribbājako tasmai evam chasu dvāresu vaḍḍhim paññapeti yasmai yam channam pi

original: cakkhādīnaṃ yathāsakaṃ visayaggahaṇaṃ paṭikkhipanto lokassa avaḍḍhitaṃ vināsameva
analyzed: cakkha ādīnam yathāsakam visaya ggahaṇam paṭikkhipanto lokassa avaḍḍhitam

original: paññapeti, tasmā so sayampi vaḍḍhihato hatavaḍḍhito.
analyzed: paññapeti tasmā so sayam pi vaḍḍhi hataḥ hata vaḍḍhitaḥ

original: Saṃkilesato ārakattā ariyo niyyānikadhammabhāvato ñāyo dhammo. Vajjalesassapi abhāvato
analyzed: saṃkilesataḥ ārakattā ariyaḥ niyyānika dhamma bhāvataḥ ñāyaḥ dhammaḥ vajja lesassa api abhāvato

original: kusalo. Tenāha “parisuddhe kāraṇadhamme anavajje”ti. Uggatassāti uccakulīnatādinā
analyzed: tena āha parisuddhe kāraṇa dhamme anavajja iti uggatassa ati ucca kulīna tā ādinā

original: uḷārassa. Mukhe ārakkhaṃ ṭhapetvāti mukhena saṃyato hutvā. Ambajambūādīni gahetvā
analyzed: uḷārassa mukhe ārakkham ṭhapetvā ati mukhena saṃyataḥ hutvā amba jambū ādīni gahetvā

original: viya apūrayamānoti ambajambūādīni aññamaññavisadisāni viya pūraṇakathānayena yaṃ
analyzed: viya a pūrayamānaḥ iti amba jambu ādīni añña mañña visadisāni pūraṇa kathā nayena yam

original: kiñci akathetvā. Tenāha “mayā kathitaniyāmenā”ti.
analyzed: kiñci a kathetvā tena āha mayā kathita niyāmena ati

original: 208. Phalasamāpattiyā vuṭṭhitoti divāvihārato vuṭṭhitoti attho. Divāvihāropi hi “paṭisallāna”nti
analyzed: phala samāpattiyā vuṭṭhitaḥ ti divāvihārataḥ vuṭṭhitaḥ ti atthaḥ divāvihāraḥ api hi paṭisallānam ti

original: vuccati “rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādī”tiādīsu. Bhagavā
analyzed: vuccati rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evam cetasaḥ parivitakkaḥ udapādi iti ādīsu bhagavā

original: hi phalasamāpattito vuṭṭhānuttarakālaṃ tesaṃ kathāsallāpaṃ sutvā divāvihārato vuṭṭhāya

original: tattha gato. Saṃvego nāma sahottappañāṇaṃ, taṃ nibbindanavasenapi hoti, saṃveganissitaṃ
analyzed: tattha gataḥ saṃvegaḥ nāma saha uttappa ñāṇam tam nibbindana vasena api hoti saṃvega nissitam

original: sandhāyāha “pītisaṃvegena saṃviggo”ti. So pana yasmā purimāvatthāya calanaṃ hoti
analyzed: sandhāya āha pīti saṃvegena saṃviggo ti saḥ pana yasmai purima avatthāya calanam hoti

original: cittassa, tasmā āha “calito kampito”ti. Tikhiṇasotena purisenāti bhagavantaṃ sandhāyāha.
analyzed: cittassa tasmai āha calitaḥ kampitaḥ iti tikhiṇa sotena purisena ati bhagavantam sandhāya āha

original: 209. Dhammadesanaṃ ārabhi yathā vineyyadamanakusalo vasanaṭṭhānaṭṭhenāti idaṃ āramitabbabhāvassa
analyzed: dhamma desanam ārabhi yathā vineyya damana kusalaḥ vasana ṭṭhāna ṭṭhena ati idam āramitabba bhāvassa

original: bhāvalakkhaṇavacanaṃ. Āramati etthāti ārāmo, rūpaṃ ārāmo etassāti rūpārāmaṃ, tato
analyzed: bhāva lakkhaṇa vacanam āramati ettha ati ārāmaḥ rūpam ārāmaḥ etassa ati rūpa ārāmam tatas

original: eva tanninnabhāvena rūpe ratanti rūparataṃ, tena sammo duppattiyā rūpena sammuditanti
analyzed: eva tat ninna bhāvena rūpe ratanti rūpa ratam tena sammo duppattiyā rūpena sammuditanti

original: rūpasammuditaṃ, tadetaṃ tadabhihatajavanakiccaṃ tattha āropetvā vuttaṃ. Dantantiādīsupi
analyzed: rūpa sammuditam tat etam tad abhihata javana kiccam tattha āropetvā vuttam danta nti ādīsu pi

original: eseva nayo. Dantaṃ damitaṃ. Nibbisevananti vigatavisukāyikaṃ. Guttanti satiyā guttaṃ.
analyzed: esa iva nayaḥ dantam damitam nibbisevanam nibbisevanam ti vigata visu kāyikam guttam ti satiyā guttam

analyzed: rakkhitanti tassa iva vevacanam saṃvutanti apanītam pavesa nivāraṇena tena āha pihitanti

original: 210. Uppajjanapariḷāhanti uppajjanakilesapariḷāhaṃ. Kiṃ vacanaṃ vattabbaṃ assāti

analyzed: rūpa ārammaṇam anubhavitvā samudaya ādi pahānam pariggaṇhitvā parinibbinditvā virajjitvā

analyzed: paribbājako tādise sāra baddha vimuttike vuddhi hato ti na vadeyya ati āha na kiñci bho gotama ati

original: 211. Teti tayā, ayameva vā pāṭho. Vassaṃ vāso vassaṃ uttarapadalopena, vassituṃ arahatīti vassiko, vassakāle nivāsānucchavikoti attho.
analyzed: tā iti tayā ayam eva vā pāṭhaḥ vassam vāsaḥ vassam uttara pada lopena vassitum arahati iti vassikaḥ vassa kāle attho

original: Nātiucco hoti nātinīcoti gimhiko viya ucco, hemantiko viya nīco na hoti, atha kho
analyzed: na ati uccaḥ hoti na ati nīcaḥ iti gimhikaḥ viya uccaḥ hemantikaḥ viya nīcaḥ na hoti atha kho

original: tadubhayavemajjhalakkhaṇatāya nātiucco hoti nātinīco. Nātitanūnīti hemantikassa viya
analyzed: tad ubhaya vemajjha lakkhaṇa tāya na ati uccaḥ hoti na ati nīcaḥ na ati tanūni iti hemantikassa viya

original: na khuddakāni. Nātibahūnīti gimhikassa viya na atibahūni. Missakānevāti hemantikagimhikesu
analyzed: na khuddakāni na atibahūni iti gimhikassa viya na atibahūni missakān eva ati hemantika gimhikesu

original: vuttalakkhaṇavomissakāni. Uṇhapavesanatthāyāti niyūhesu purebhattaṃ pacchābhattañca
analyzed: vutta lakkhaṇa vomissakāni uṇha pavesana atthāya ati niyūhesu purebhattam pacchābhattam ca

original: patitasūriyobhāsavasena uṇhassa abbhantarapavesanatthāya. Bhittiniyūhāni nīharīyantīti
analyzed: patita sūriya ubhāsa vasena uṇhassa abbhantara pavesana tthāya bhitti niyūhāni nīharīyanti iti

original: dakkhiṇapasse bhittīsu niyūhāni nīharitvā karīyanti. Vipulajālānīti puthulachiddāni.
analyzed: dakkhiṇa passe bhittīsu niyūhāni nīharitvā karīyanti vipula jālāni iti puthula chiddāni

original: Udakayantānīti udakavāhakayantāni.
analyzed: udaka yantāni iti udaka vāhaka yantāni

original: Nīluppalagacchake katvāti vikasitehi nīluppalehi gacchake naḷinike katvā. Gandhakalalanti
analyzed: nīluppala gacchake katvā ati vikasitehi nīluppalehi gacchake naḷinike katvā gandha kalalanti

original: gandhamissakakaddamaṃ. Yamakabhittīti yugaḷabhitti, tassā antare nāḷi, yato udakaṃ
analyzed: gandha missaka kaddamam yamaka bhitti iti yugaḷa bhitti tassāḥ antare yatas udakam

original: abhiruhati. Lohanāḷinti lohamayayantanāḷiṃ. Jālanti tambalohamayaṃ jālaṃ. Heṭṭhā
analyzed: abhiruhati loha nāḷim iti tamba loha mayam jālam heṭṭhā

original: yantaṃ parivattentīti heṭṭhābhāge udakayantaṃ gamenti. Udakaphusite temente vivaṇṇatā
analyzed: yantam parivattenti iti heṭṭhābhāge udaka yantam gamenti udaka phusite temente vivaṇṇa tā

original: māhosīti nīlapaṭaṃ nivāseti. Divākāleti divasavelāya. Ajjhattaṃ vūpasantacitto viharāmīti

original: etena attano phalasamāpattivihāro bhagavatā dassitoti āha – “tāya ratiyā ramamānoti
analyzed: etena attano phala samāpatti vihāraḥ bhagavatā dassito ti āha tāya ratiyā ramamāno ti

original: idaṃ catutthajjhānikaphalasamāpattiratiṃ sandhāya vutta”nti.
analyzed: idam catuttha jhānika phala samāpatti ratim sandhāya vuttam ti

original: 212. Mahā ca nesaṃ papañcoti nesaṃ rājūnaṃ mahāpapañco rājiddhivasena sabbadā sampattivisayo
analyzed: ca nesam papañco ti nesam rājūnam mahā papañcaḥ rājiddhi vasena sabbadā sampatti visayo

original: ca, anubhavituṃ na labhantīti adhippāyo. Mante gavesantā vicaranti, na bhogasukhaṃ.
analyzed: ca anubhavitum na labhanti iti adhippāyaḥ mante gavesantāḥ vicaranti na bhoga sukham

original: Gaṇanā nāma acchinnagaṇanā, na vigaṇagaṇanā na paṇagaṇanā. Āvaṭṭoti yathādhigate

original: dibbe kāme pahāya kāmahetu āvaṭṭo nivatto parivattito bhaveyya. Evaṃ mānusakā kāmāti

original: yathā koci kusaggena udakaṃ gahetvā mahāsamudde udakaṃ mineyya. Tattha mahāsamudde

original: kāmā appamattakā oramattakā nihīnā, dibbāva kāmā mahantā vipulā uḷārā paṇītā. Samadhigayhāti

original: sammā adhigamanavasena niggayha dibbampi sukhaṃ hīnaṃ katvā tiṭṭhati.

original: 213. Ārogyahetukaṃ sukhaṃ assa atthīti sukhī, taṃ panassa rogavigamatovāti āha “paṭhamaṃ
analyzed: ārogya hetukam sukham assa atthi iti sukhī tam panassa roga vigamataḥ vā ati āha paṭhamam

original: dukkhito pacchā sukhito”ti. Serī nāma attādhīnavuttīti āha “serī ekako bhaveyyā”ti.
analyzed: dukkhito pacchā sukhito ti serī nāma atta adhīna vuttī iti āha serī ekakaḥ bhaveyya iti

original: Attano vaso sayaṃvaso, so etassa atthīti sayaṃvasī. Aṅgārakapallaṃ viya kāmavatthupariḷāhahetuto.
analyzed: attanaḥ vaso sayaṃvaso saḥ etassa atthi iti sayaṃvasī aṅgāraka pallam viya kāma vatthu pariḷāha hetutaḥ

original: Tacchetvāti ghaṭṭetvā, kaṇḍūyitvāti attho.

analyzed: tesam vā paṭipattim paṭipannakaḥ jinoti jiṇṇaḥ jarā vasena nihīna dhātukaḥ iti vadanti

original: attano vā paṭipattiyā paṭipakkhaṃ jinitvā ṭhito. So kira tathābhūto kassacipi dhammaṃ
analyzed: attanaḥ vā paṭipattiyā paṭipakkham jinitvā ṭhitaḥ so kira tathābhūtaḥ kassaci pi dhammaṃ

original: na katheti, tenāha “na kiñci āhā”ti. Alābhinti “so na kumbhimukhā paṭiggaṇhatī”tiādinā
analyzed: na kathā iti tena āha na kiñci so na paṭiggaṇhati iti ādinā

original: nayena vuttaalābhahetusamāyogena alābhiṃ. Tato eva jighacchādubbalaparetatāya sayanaparāyaṇaṃ
analyzed: nayena vutta alābha hetu samāyogena alābhim tatas eva jighacchā dubbala pareta tāya sayana parāyaṇam

original: samaṇaṃ pannabhūmīti vadati.
analyzed: samaṇam panna bhūmī iti vadati

original: Ājīvavuttisatānīti sattānaṃ ājīvabhūtāni jīvikāvuttisatāni. Pasuggahaṇena eḷakajāti
analyzed: ājīva vutti satāni iti sattānam ājīva bhūtāni jīvikā vutti satāni pasu ggahaṇena eḷaka jāti

original: gahitā, migaggahaṇena rurugavayādisabbamigajāti. Bahū devāti cātumahārājikādibrahmakāyikādivasena
analyzed: gahitāḥ miga ggahaṇena ruru gavaya ādi sabba miga jāti bahū cātumahārājika ādi brahmakāyika ādi vasena

original: nesaṃ antarabhedavasena bahū devā. Tattha cātumahārājikānaṃ ekacco antarabhedo “mahāsamayasuttena”
analyzed: antara bheda vasena bahū devā tattha cātumahārājikānam ekaccaḥ antara bhedaḥ mahā samaya suttena

original: dīpetabbo. Mānusāpi anantāti dīpadesakulavaṃsājīvādivibhāgavasena mānusāpi anantabhedā.
analyzed: dīpetabbaḥ mānusā api anantā ati dīpa desa kula vaṃsa ājīva ādi vibhāga vasena mānusā api ananta bhedā

original: Pisācā eva pesācā, te aparapetādayo mahantā veditabbā.
analyzed: pisācā eva pesācā te aparapeta ādayaḥ mahantā veditabbā

original: Chaddantadahamandākiniyo kuḷīramucalindanāmena vadati. Gaṇṭhikāti pabbagaṇṭhikā. Paṇḍitopi…pe… uddhaṃ na gacchati, kasmā? Sattānaṃ saṃsaraṇakālassa niyatabhāvato.
analyzed: kuḷīra mucalinda nāmena vadati gaṇṭhikā ati pabbagaṇṭhikā uddham na gacchati kasmā sattānam saṃsaraṇa kālassa niyata bhāvato

original: Aparipakkaṃ saṃsaraṇanimittaṃ sīlādinā paripāceti nāma sīghaṃyeva visuddhippattiyā.
analyzed: a paripakkam saṃsaraṇa nimittam sīla ādinā paripāca iti nāma sīgham yā iva visuddhi ppattiyā

original: Paripakkaṃ phussa phussa patvā patvā paripakkabhāvāpādanena byantiṃ karoti nāma.
analyzed: paripakkam phussa phussa patvā patvā paripakka bhāva āpādanena byantim karoti nāma

original: Suttaguḷeti suttavaṭṭiyaṃ. Nibbeṭhiyamānameva paletīti upamāya sattānaṃ saṃsāro anukkamena
analyzed: sutta guḷā iti sutta vaṭṭiyam nibbeṭhiyamānam eva paleti iti upamāya sattānam saṃsāraḥ anukkamena

original: khīyateva, na tassa vaddhīti dasseti paricchinnarūpattā.
analyzed: khīyatā iva na tassa vaddhi iti dassā iti paricchinna rūpa ttā

original: 229. Niyativāde pakkhipantoti sabbaññutaṃ paṭijānitvāpi padesaññutāya asampāyamāno tattha attano aññāṇakiriyaṃ pariharituṃ asakkonto ca “evamesā niyatī”ti niyativāde pakkhipanto.
analyzed: niyati vāde pakkhipanto ti sabbaññu tam paṭijānitvā api padesaññu tāya a sampāyamāno tattha attanaḥ aññāṇa kiriyam pariharitum a sakkonto ca evam esā niyatī iti niyati vāde pakkhipanto

original: 230. Dhammakathāya apassayabhūto anussavo etassa atthīti anussavī, tenevassa apassayavādaṃ
analyzed: dhamma kathāya apassaya bhūtaḥ anussavaḥ etassa atthi iti anussavī tena iva assa apassaya vādam

original: dassetuṃ “anussavanissito”ti āha. Savanaṃ saccatoti yaṃ kiñci anussavaṃ, taṃ savanaṃ
analyzed: dassetum anussava nissitaḥ ti āha savanam saccatas ti yam kiñci anussavam tam savanam

original: saccanti gahetvā ṭhito. Piṭakasampadāyāti ganthasampādanena, tādisaṃ ganthaṃ paguṇaṃ
analyzed: gahetvā ṭhitaḥ piṭaka sampadā āyāti gantha sampādanena tādisam gantham paguṇam

original: vācuggataṃ katvā taṃ nissāya dhammaṃ katheti. Tenāha “vaggapaṇṇāsakāyā”tiādi.
analyzed: vācuggatam katvā tam nissāya dhammam katheti tena āha vagga paṇṇāsakāya atiādi

original: 232. Mandapaññoti parittapañño. Momūhoti sammuyhako. “Evantipi me no”tiādinā vividho
analyzed: manda pañño ti paritta paññaḥ momūho ti sammuyhako me no ti ādinā vividhaḥ

original: nānappakāro khepo vācāya paravādānaṃ khīpanaṃ vācāvikkhepo, taṃ vācāvikkhepaṃ, na
analyzed: nānappakāraḥ khepaḥ vācāya paravādānam khīpanam vācā vikkhepaḥ tam vācā vikkhepam na

original: marati na pacchijjati yathāvutto vādavikkhepo etāyāti amarā, tattha pavattā diṭṭhi
analyzed: marati na pacchijjati yathā vuttaḥ vāda vikkhepaḥ etāya āti amarā tattha pavattā diṭṭhi

original: amarāvikkhepo, taṃ amarāvikkhepaṃ. Apariyantavikkhepanti “evampi me no”tiādinā pucchitassa
analyzed: amarā vikkhepaḥ tam amarā vikkhepam apariyanta vikkhepanti evam pi me no ti ādinā pucchitassa

original: apariyosāpanavasena vikkhepaṃ. Ito cito ca sandhāvati ekasmiṃ sabhāve anavaṭṭhānato.
analyzed: a pariyosāpana vasena vikkhepam itas citas ca sandhāvati ekasmin sabhāve anavaṭṭhānato

original: Gāhaṃ na upagacchatīti micchāgāhatāya uttaravidhānāya purimapakkhaṃ ṭhapetvā gāhaṃ
analyzed: gāham naḥ upagacchati iti micchā gāhatāya uttara vidhānāya purima pakkham ṭhapetvā gāham

original: na upagacchati. Amarāsadisāya amarāya vikkhepoti amarāvikkhepo.
analyzed: na upagacchati amara asadisāya amarāya vikkhepo ti amara a vikkhepo

original: Idaṃ kusalanti ettha iti-saddo pakārattho, iminā pakārenāti attho. Amarāvikkhepiko
analyzed: idam kusalam ti ettha iti saddo pakāra attho iminā pakārena ati atthaḥ amarāvikkhepikaḥ

original: yathā kusale, evaṃ aññasmiṃ yaṃ kiñci kenaci pucchitaṃ atthaṃ attano aruccanatāya
analyzed: yathā kusale evam aññasmin yam kiñci kenacid pucchitam attham attanaḥ a ruccana tāya

original: “evantipi me no”tiādinā tattha tattha vikkhepaññeva āpajjati, tasmā “evantipi me
analyzed: evam tipi me no ti ādinā tattha tattha āpajjati tasmai evam tipi me

original: no”tiādi tattha tattha pucchitākārapaṭisedhanavasena vikkhipanākāradassanaṃ. Nanu
analyzed: no tiādi tattha tattha pucchita ākāra paṭisedhana vasena vikkhipana ākāra dassanam nanu

original: cettha vikkhepavādino vikkhepapakkhassa ananujānanaṃ vikkhepapakkhe avaṭṭhānaṃ yuttanti?
analyzed: ca ittha vikkhepa vādinaḥ vikkhepa pakkhassa ananujānanam vikkhepa pakkhe avaṭṭhānam yuttam ti

original: Na, tatthāpi tassa sammūḷhassa paṭikkhepavaseneva vikkhepavādassa pavattanato. Tena
analyzed: na tattha api tassa sammūḷhassa paṭikkhepa vasena iva vikkhepa vādassa pavattanato tena

original: vuttaṃ “no”ti. Tathā hi sañcayo belaṭṭhaputto raññā ajātasattunā sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ
analyzed: vuttam no ti tathā hi sañcayaḥ belaṭṭha putto raññā ajātasattunā sandiṭṭhikam sāmañña phalam

original: puṭṭho paralokattikādīnaṃ paṭisedhanamukhena vikkhepaṃ byākāsi.
analyzed: puṭṭhaḥ para loka ttika ādīnam paṭisedhana mukhena vikkhepam

original: Etthāha – “nanu cāyaṃ sabbopi amarāvikkhepiko kusalādayo dhamme paralokattikādīni
analyzed: ettha āha nanu ca ayam sabbaḥ api amara avikkhepikaḥ kusala ādayaḥ dhamme

original: ca yathābhūtaṃ anavabujjhamāno tattha tattha pañhaṃ puṭṭho samāno pucchāya vikkhepamattaṃ
analyzed: ca yathābhūtam an avabujjhamāno tattha tattha pañham puṭṭho samāno pucchāya vikkhepa mattam

original: āpajjati, tassa kathaṃ diṭṭhigatabhāvo. Na hi avattukāmassa viya pucchitamatthaṃ
analyzed: āpajjati tassa katham diṭṭhigata bhāvaḥ na hi a vattu kāmassa viya pucchitam attham

original: ajānantassa vikkhepakaraṇamattena tassa diṭṭhigatikatā yuttā”ti? Vuccate – na heva
analyzed: a jānantassa vikkhepa karaṇa mattena tassa diṭṭhigatika tā yuttā iti vuccate na hā iva

original: kho pucchāya vikkhepakaraṇamattena tassa diṭṭhigatikatā, atha kho micchābhinivesavasena.
analyzed: kho pucchāya vikkhepa karaṇa mattena tassa diṭṭhi gatika tā atha kho micchā abhinivesa vasena

original: Sassatābhinivesena micchābhiniviṭṭhoyeva hi puggalo mandabuddhitāya kusalādidhamme
analyzed: sassata abhinivesena micchā abhiniviṭṭhaḥ yeva hi puggalaḥ manda buddhi tāya kusala ādi dhamme

original: paralokattikādīni ca yāthāvato appaṭipajjamāno attanā aviññātassa atthassa paraṃ
analyzed: para loka ttika ādīni ca yāthāvataḥ a paṭipajjamānaḥ attanā a viññātassa atthassa param

original: viññāpetuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya musāvādabhayena ca vikkhepaṃ āpajjatīti. Atha vā puññapāpānaṃ
analyzed: viññāpetum a sakkuṇeyya tāya musāvāda bhayena ca vikkhepam āpajjati iti atha vā puñña pāpānam

original: tabbipākānañca anavabodhena asaddahanena ca tabbisayāya pucchāya vikkhepakaraṇaṃyeva
analyzed: tad vipākānam ca anavabodhena asat dahanena ca tad visayāya pucchāya vikkhepa karaṇam yeva

original: sundaranti khantiṃ ruciṃ uppādetvā abhinivisantassa uppannā visuṃyeva sā ekā diṭṭhi
analyzed: khantim rucim uppādetvā abhinivisantassa uppannā sā ekā diṭṭhi

original: sattabhaṅgadiṭṭhi viyāti daṭṭhabbā, indriyabaddhato ca tatiyaṭṭhānabhāve dassito.
analyzed: satta bhaṅga diṭṭhi viyā ti daṭṭhabbā indriya baddhato ca tatiya ṭṭhāna bhāve dassito

original: 234. Sannidhikārakaṃ kāmeti ettha anindriyabaddhāni adhippetānīti tilataṇḍulādiggahaṇaṃ,
analyzed: sannidhi kārakam kāma iti ettha anindriya baddhāni adhippetāni iti tila taṇḍula ādi gahaṇam

analyzed: tassa lokassa appasāda parihāra attham kadāci taṇḍula nāḷi ādi saṅgahaṇa karaṇam sandhāya

original: vuttaṃ “tilataṇḍulādayo paññāyantī”ti.
analyzed: vuttam tila taṇḍula ādayaḥ paññāyanti iti

original: 236. Ājīvakā matā nāmāti ime ājīvakā sabbaso sammāpaṭipattirahitā micchā eva ca paṭipajjamānā
analyzed: ājīvakāḥ matāḥ nāma ati ime ājīvakā sabbaso sammā paṭipatti rahitā micchā eva ca paṭipajjamānā

original: adhisīlasaṅkhātassa sīlajīvitassa abhāvena matā nāma. Puttamatāti mataputtā. Samaṇe
analyzed: adhi sīla saṅkhātassa sīla jīvitassa abhāvena matā nāma putta matā ati mata puttā samaṇe

original: gotame brahmacariyavāso atthīti samaṇaṃ eva gotamaṃ parisuddho suparipuṇṇo takkarassa
analyzed: gotame brahmacariya vāsaḥ atthi iti samaṇam eva gotamam parisuddhaḥ su paripuṇṇo takkarassa

original: sammā dukkhakkhayāvaho brahmacariyavāso atthi. Etenettha dhammasudhammatādidīpanena
analyzed: sammā dukkha kkhaya āvahaḥ brahmacariya vāsaḥ atthi etena ittha dhamma su dhamma tā ādi dīpanena

original: buddhasubuddhatañca dīpeti, aññattha natthīti iminā bāhirakesu tassa abhāvaṃ. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
analyzed: dīpeti aññattha natthi iti iminā bāhirakesu tassa abhāvam sesam su viññeyyam eva

original: Sandakasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.
analyzed: sandaka sutta vaṇṇanāya līnattha ppakāsanā samattā

original: 7. Mahāsakuludāyisuttavaṇṇanā
237. Abhiññātāti ediso ediso cāti abhilakkhaṇavasena ñātā. Appasaddassa vinīto, appasaddatāya
analyzed: abhiññātā ati edisaḥ edisaḥ ca ati abhilakkhaṇa vasena ñātā appasaddassa vinītaḥ appasadda tāya

original: mandabhāṇitāya vinītoti ca appasaddavinītoti vuccamāne aññena vinītabhāvo dīpito
analyzed: manda bhāṇitāya vinītaḥ iti ca appasadda vinītaḥ ti vuccamāne aññena vinīta bhāvaḥ dīpito

original: hoti, bhagavā pana sayambhuñāṇena sayameva vinīto. Tasmā pāḷiyaṃ “appasaddavinīto”ti
analyzed: hoti bhagavā pana sayambhu ñāṇena sayam eva vinīto tasmā pāḷiyam appasadda vinīto ti

original: na vuttaṃ. Tenāha “na hi bhagavā aññena vinīto”ti.
analyzed: na vuttam tena āha na hi bhagavā aññena vinītaḥ ti

original: 238. Hiyyodivasaṃ upādāya tato āsannāni katipayāni divasāni purimāni nāma honti,
analyzed: hiyyodivasam upādāya tatas āsannāni katipayāni divasāni purimāni nāma honti

original: purimānīti ca pubbakāni, atītānīti attho. Tato paranti yathā vuttaatītadivasato anantaraṃ
analyzed: purimāni iti ca pubbakāni atītāni iti atthaḥ tatas param ti yathā vutta atīta divasataḥ anantaram

original: paraṃ purimataraṃ atisayena purimattā. Iti imesu dvīsu pavattito yathākkamaṃ purimapurimatarabhāvo,
analyzed: param purimataram atisayena purimattā iti imesu dvīsu pavattitaḥ yathākkamam purima purimatara bhāvaḥ

original: evaṃ santepi yadettha “purimatara”nti vuttaṃ, tato pabhuti yaṃ yaṃ oraṃ, taṃ taṃ
analyzed: evam sante pi yat ettha purimataram ti vuttam tatas pabhuti yaṃ yaṃ oraṃ taṃ taṃ

original: paraṃ, yaṃ yaṃ paraṃ, taṃ taṃ “purimatara”nti vuttaṃ hoti. Kutūhalayuttā sālā kutūhalasālā
analyzed: param yam yam param tam tam purimataran ti vuttam hoti kutūhala yuttā sālā kutūhala sālā

original: yathā “ājaññaratho”ti. Ime dassanādayo.
analyzed: yathā ājaññaratho ti ime dassana ādayo

original: Ayathābhūtaguṇehīti ayathābhūtaṃ micchādīpitaatthamatteneva ugghositaguṇehi samuggato
analyzed: ayathābhūta guṇehi iti ayathābhūtam micchā dīpita attha mattena iva ugghosita guṇehi samuggataḥ

original: ghosito. Taranti atikkamanti etenāti titthaṃ, aggamaggo. Diṭṭhigatikamaggo pana ayathābhūtopi
analyzed: ghositaḥ taranti atikkamanti etena ati tittham aggamaggaḥ diṭṭhigatika maggaḥ pana ayathābhūtaḥ api

original: tesaṃ tathā vitaraṇaṃ upādāya titthanti voharīyatīti taṃ karontā titthakarā. Osaratīti pavisati.
analyzed: tesam tathā vitaraṇam upādāya titthanti voharīyati iti tam karontā titthakarāḥ osarati iti pavisati

original: 239. Sahitanti pubbāparāviruddhaṃ. Na kiñci jātanti paṭiññādosahetudosaudāharaṇadosaduṭṭhadosatāya
analyzed: sahitanti pubba apara aviruddham na kiñci jātanti paṭiññā dosa hetu dosa udāharaṇa dosa duṭṭha dosa tāya

original: na kiñci jātaṃ. Tenāha “āropito te vādo”ti. Vadanti tena paribhāsantīti vādo doso.
analyzed: na kiñci jātam tena āha āropito te vādaḥ iti vadanti tena paribhāsanti iti vādaḥ doso

original: Sabhāvakkosenāti sabhāvato pavattakoṭṭhāsena.
analyzed: sabhā vakkosena ati sabhāvataḥ pavatta koṭṭhāsena

original: 240. Pīḷeyyāti madhubhaṇḍena saha bhājane pīḷetvā dadeyya. Sabrahmacārīhi sampayojetvāti sahadhammikehi viheṭhanapayogaṃ katvā, tenāha “vivādaṃ katvā”ti.
analyzed: pīḍeyya iti madhu bhaṇḍena saha bhājane pīḍetvā dadeyya sabrahmacārīhi sampayojetvā ati sahadhammikehi viheṭhana payogam katvā tena āha vivādam katvā iti

original: 241. Itarītarenāti paṇītato itarena. Tenāha “lāmakalāmakenā”ti.
analyzed: itarītareṇa ati itarena tena āha lāmaka lāmakena ati

original: 242. Bhattakosakenāti kosakabhattena, khuddakasarāvabhattakenāti attho. Beluvamattabhattāhārāti
analyzed: bhattakosakena ati kosaka bhattena khuddaka sarāva bhattakena ati attho beluva matta bhatta āhārā ti

original: billapamāṇabhattabhojanā. Oṭṭhavaṭṭiyāti mukhavaṭṭiyā. Sabbākārenevāti sabbappakāreneva.
analyzed: billa pamāṇa bhatta bhojanā oṭṭha vaṭṭiyā ati mukha vaṭṭiyā sabba ākārena iva ati sabba ppakārena iva

original: Anappāhāroti na vattabbo kadāci appāhāroti katvā. Tattha ativiya aññehi avisayhaṃ
analyzed: anappāhāro ti na vattabbo kadāci appāhāro ti katvā tattha ativiya aññehi avisayham

original: appāhārataṃ bhagavato dassetuṃ “padhānabhūmiya”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Mayāti nissakkavacanaṃ.
analyzed: appāhāra tam bhagavataḥ dassetum padhāna bhūmiyan tiādi vuttam mayā iti nissakka vacanam

original: Visesatarāti tena dhammena visesavantatarā.
analyzed: visesatarā ti tena dhammena visesavantatarā

original: Vatasamādānavaseneva paṃsukūlaṃ dhārentīti paṃsukūlikāti āha – “samādinnapaṃsukūlikaṅgā”ti,
analyzed: vata samādāna vasena iva paṃsu kūlam dhārenti iti paṃsukūlikā iti āha samādinna paṃsukūlikaṅgā iti

original: saddattho pana “visuddhimagge” vuttanayena veditabbo. Piṇḍapātikā sapadānacārinotiādīsupi
analyzed: sadda atthaḥ pana visuddhi magge vutta nayena veditabbaḥ piṇḍapātikā sa padāna cārinaḥ ti ādīsu pi

original: eseva nayo. Tattha tattha satthena chinditattā satthalūkhāni. Yaṃ yaṃ sappāyaṃ, tasseva
analyzed: esa iva nayaḥ tattha tattha satthena sattha lūkhāni yam yam sappāyam tassa iva

original: gahaṇaṃ uccinanti āha “uccinitvā…pe… thiraṭṭhānameva gahetvā”ti. Alābulomasānīti
analyzed: gahaṇam uccinanti āha uccinitvā ape thira ṭṭhānam eva gahetvā ati alābu lomasāni iti

original: alābulomāni viya sukhumatarāni cīvarasuttaṃsūni etesaṃ santīti alābulomasāni. Pātitasāṇapaṃsukūlanti
analyzed: alābu lomāni viya sukhumatarāni cīvara sutta aṃsūni etesam santi iti alābu lomasāni

original: kaḷevarena saddhiṃ chaḍḍitasāṇamayaṃ paṃsukūlaṃ, yaṃ tumbamatte puḷave odhunitvā satthā gaṇhi.
analyzed: kaḷevarena saddhim chaḍḍita sāṇa mayam paṃsukūlam yam tumba matte puḷave odhunitvā satthā gaṇhi

original: ca vinā appanā hoti, saha nimittuppādeneva appanaṃ pāpetī”ti vadanti, taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ.
analyzed: ca vinā appanā hoti saha nimitta uppādena iva appanam pāpeti iti vadanti tam tesam matimattam

original: Na hi pārivāsikaparikammena appanāvāro icchito, nāpi mahaggatappamāṇajjhānesu viya
analyzed: na hi pārivāsika parikammena appanāvāraḥ icchitaḥ na api mahaggata ppamāṇa jhānesu viya

analyzed: katipaya bhavaṅga citta avasāne appanam pāpuṇantaḥ saha nimitta uppādena iva ittha appanam

original: pāpetī”ti vutto. “Saha nimittuppādenā”ti ca adhippāyikamidaṃ vacanaṃ, na nītatthaṃ,
analyzed: pāpā iti iti vuttaḥ saha nimitta uppādena ati ca adhippāyikam idam vacanam na nīta ttham

original: adhippāyo vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
analyzed: adhippāyaḥ vutta nayena iva veditabbaḥ

original: Na antosamāpattiyaṃ tadā tathārūpassa ābhogassa asambhavato, samāpattito vuṭṭhitassa

original: Rūpe saññā rūpasaññā, sā assa atthīti rūpasaññī, na rūpasaññī arūpasaññī. Saññāsīsena

original: satthu desanāvilāsamattamevā”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: satthu desanā vilāsa mattam evā ti vuttam

analyzed: ce kadāci vaṇṇa vasena ābhujitāni honti suvaṇṇa dubbaṇṇāni pariyāya kathā

original: hi suttantadesanāti. Abhidhamme pana nippariyāyadesanattā vaṇṇābhogarahitāni visuṃ
analyzed: hi suttanta desanā ti abhidhamme pana nippariyāya desana ttā vaṇṇa ābhoga rahitāni visum

original: vuttāni, tathā sahitāni. Atthi hi ubhayattha abhibhavanapariyāyoti “ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī”tiādinā
analyzed: vuttāni tathā sahitāni atthi hi ubhayattha abhibhavana pariyāyaḥ ti ajjhattam rūpa saññī iti ādinā

original: paṭhamadutiyaabhibhāyatanesu paṭhamavimokkho, tatiyacatutthābhibhāyatanesu dutiyavimokkho,
analyzed: paṭhama dutiya abhibhāyatanesu paṭhama vimokkho tatiya catuttha abhibhāyatanesu dutiya vimokkho

analyzed: vavatthānam katam iti viññāyati

analyzed: idam abhidhamme katthacipi ajjhattam rūpāni

original: “Suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇānī”ti eteneva siddhattā nīlādiabhibhāyatanāni na vattabbānīti ce?
analyzed: suvaṇṇa dubbaṇṇāni iti etena iva siddha ttā nīla ādi abhibhāyatanāni na vattabbāni iti ce

original: Na, nīlādīsu katādhikārānaṃ nīlādibhāvasseva abhibhavanakāraṇattā. Na hi tesaṃ parisuddhāparisuddhavaṇṇānaṃ
analyzed: na nīla ādīsu kata adhikārānam nīla ādi bhāvassa iva abhibhavana kāraṇa ttā na hi tesam parisuddha aparisuddha vaṇṇānam

original: “imesu panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.

analyzed: bārāṇasiyam bhavanti bārāṇasiyam samuṭṭhitam

original: Te dhammeti te satipaṭṭhānādidhamme ceva aṭṭhavimokkhadhamme ca. Ciṇṇavasībhāvāyeva tattha abhivisiṭṭhāya paññāya pariyosānuttaraṃ sataṃ gatā abhiññāvosānapāramippattā.

original: 250. Sakalaṭṭhenāti sakalabhāvena, asubhanimittādīsu viya ekadese aṭṭhatvā anavasesato
analyzed: sakala aṭṭhena ati sakala bhāvena asubha nimitta ādīsu eka dese anavasesato

analyzed: tiriyanti yojetabbam paricchinditvā eva hi sabbattha kasiṇam vaḍḍhetabbam tena

analyzed: atthaḥ ekassa ati pathavī kasiṇa ādīsu ekekassa añña bhāva anupagamana attham ti añña kasiṇa bhāva anupagamana dīpana ttham

analyzed: ākāsam hoti iti evam yattakam ṭhānam ākāsam hutvā upaṭṭhitam tattakam ākāsam eva hutvā

analyzed: viññāṇassa pavattanataḥ āgamana vasena viññāṇa kasiṇe pi uddhaṃ adhas tiriya tā vuttā ati kasiṇugghāṭima ākāsa vasena

original: tattha pavattaviññāṇe uddhaṃadhotiriyatā veditabbā”ti āha.
analyzed: tattha pavatta viññāṇe uddhaṃadhotiriya tā veditabbā ti āha

original: 252. Vuttoyeva vammikasutte. Nissitañca chavatthunissitattā vipassanāñāṇassa. Paṭibaddhañca
analyzed: vuttaḥ yeva vammika sutte nissitañca cha vatthu nissita ttā vipassanā ñāṇassa paṭibaddhañca

analyzed: vā subhaḥ kuruvinda jāti ādi jāti visesaḥ api maṇi ākara pārisuddhi mūlakaḥ

original: āha “suṭṭhu kataparikammo apanītapāsāṇasakkharo”ti. Dhovanavedhanādīhīti catūsu pāsāṇesu

original: dhovanena ceva kāḷakādiapaharaṇatthāya suttena āvunanatthāya ca vijjhanena. Tāpasaṇhakaraṇādīnaṃ

original: saṅgaho ādi-saddena. Vaṇṇasampattinti suttassa vaṇṇasampattiṃ.
analyzed: saṅgahaḥ ādi saddena vaṇṇa sampattiṃ ti suttassa vaṇṇa sampattim

original: Maṇi viya karajakāyo paccavekkhitabbato. Āvutasuttaṃ viya vipassanāñāṇaṃ anupavisitvā
analyzed: maṇi viya karaja kāyaḥ paccavekkhitabbataḥ āvuta suttam viya vipassanā ñāṇam an upavisitvā

original: ṭhitattā. Cakkhumā puriso viya vipassanālābhī bhikkhu sammadeva tassa dassanato.

original: saṅkaraṃ katvā. Iddhābhisaṅkhāranti abhisaṅkharaṇaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ. Abhisaṅkhāsīti adhiṭṭhahi.
analyzed: saṅkaram katvā abhisaṅkharaṇam adhiṭṭhānam abhisaṅkhāsi iti adhiṭṭhahi

original: Saṃharitvāti saṃkhipitvā. Orabhāgeti corassa orabhāge.
analyzed: saṃharitvā iti saṃkhipitvā ora bhāge iti ca urassaḥ ora bhāge

original: 349. Daṇḍoti paharaṇahatthacchedanādiko daṇḍanasaṅkhāto daṇḍo. Pavattayitabboti ānetabbo.
analyzed: daṇḍo ti paharaṇa hattha chedana ādikaḥ daṇḍana saṅkhātaḥ daṇḍo pavattayitabbo ti ānetabbo

original: Apanetvāti attano santānato samucchedavasena pahāya. Paṭisaṅkhāyāti paṭisaṅkhānena.
analyzed: apanetvā iti attano santānataḥ samuccheda vasena pahāya paṭisaṅkhāya ati paṭisaṅkhānena

original: Avihiṃsāyāti karuṇāya. Sāraṇīyadhammesūti chasupi sāraṇīyadhammesu, ṭhito aṭṭhitānaṃ
analyzed: avihiṃsāya ati karuṇāya sāraṇīya dhammesu ti chasu pi sāraṇīya dhammesu ṭhitaḥ a ṭhitānam

original: pāpadhammānaṃ bodhimūle eva samucchinnattā. Yathā atīte aparimitaṃ kālaṃ sandhāvitaṃ,
analyzed: pāpa dhammānam bodhi mūle eva yathā atīte aparimitam kālam sandhāvitam

original: evaṃ imāya paṭipattiyā anāgatepi sandhāvissatīti dassento “idānī”tiādimāha.
analyzed: evam imāya paṭipattiyā anāgate pi sandhāvissati iti dassentaḥ idāni iti ādim āha

original: Itvevāti iti eva, iti-saddo nidassanattho. Tenāha “evaṃ vatvā yevā”ti. Akirīti ākiri, pañcapi āvudhāni vikiri. Tena vuttaṃ “khipi chaḍḍesī”ti.
analyzed: itu eva ati iti eva iti saddaḥ nidassana atthaḥ tena āha evam vatvā yā iva ati akiri iti ākiri tena vuttam khipi chaḍḍesi iti

original: 350. Ettovāti ato eva āgatamaggeneva sāvatthiṃ gatā. Adhivāsessatīti “coraṃ paṭisedhetuṃ
analyzed: ettas vā ati atas eva āgata maggena iva sāvatthim gatā adhivāsessati iti coram paṭisedhetum

original: gamissāmī”ti vutte tuṇhī bhavissati. Dāruṇakammena uppannanāmanti “aṅgulimālo”ti
analyzed: gamissāmi iti vutte tuṇhī bhavissati dāruṇa kammena uppanna nāmanti aṅgulimālo ti

original: imaṃ nāmaṃ sandhāya vadati.
analyzed: imam nāmam sandhāya vadati

original: 351. Hatthī araññahatthī honti manussānaṃ tattha gantuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā, evaṃ assāpi.
analyzed: hatthī arañña hatthī honti manussānam tattha gantum a sakkuṇeyya ttā evam assa api

original: Kūṭasahassānaṃ bhijjanakāraṇaṃ hoti therassa āgamanabhayena ghaṭe chaḍḍetvā palāyanena.
analyzed: kūṭa sahassānam bhijjana kāraṇam hoti therassa āgamana bhayena ghaṭe chaḍḍetvā palāyanena

original: Gabbhamūḷhāyāti byākulagabbhāya. Pabbajjābalenāti vuttaṃ, satthu desanānubhāvenāti
analyzed: gabbha mūḷhāya ati byākula gabbhāya pabbajjā balena ati vuttam satthu desanā anubhāvena ati

original: pana vattabbaṃ. So hi tassāpi kāraṇanti. Ariyā nāma jāti pabbajjā ariyabhāvatthāya jātīti katvā.
analyzed: pana vattabbam so hi tassa api kāraṇan ti ariyā nāma jāti pabbajjā ariya bhāva tthāya jāti iti katvā

original: Mahāparittaṃ nāmetanti mahānubhāvaṃ parittaṃ nāmetaṃ. Tathā hi naṃ thero sabbabhāvena
analyzed: mahāparittam nāma etat ti mahā anubhāvam parittam nāma etat tathā hi nam theraḥ sabba bhāvena

original: ariyāya jāto saccādhiṭṭhānena akāsi. Tenāha “saccakiriyakataṭṭhāne”ti. Gabbhamūḷhanti
analyzed: ariyāya jātaḥ sacca adhiṭṭhānena akāsi tena āha sacca kiriya kata ṭṭhāna iti gabbha mūḷhanti

original: mūḷhagabbhaṃ. Gabbho hi paripakko sampajjamāno vijāyanakāle kammajavātehi sañcāletvā
analyzed: mūḷha gabbham gabbhaḥ hi paripakkaḥ sampajjamānaḥ vijāyana kāle kamma ja vātehi sañcāletvā

original: parivattito uddhaṃpādo adhosīso hutvā yonimukhābhimukho hoti, evaṃ so kassaci alaggo
analyzed: parivattitaḥ uddhaṃpādaḥ adhosīsaḥ hutvā yonimukha abhimukhaḥ hoti evam so kassaci a laggo

original: sotthinā bahi nikkhamati, vipajjamāno pana viparivattanavasena yonimaggaṃ pidahitvā
analyzed: sotthinā bahi nikkhamati vipajjamānaḥ pana viparivattana vasena yonimaggam pidahitvā

original: tiriyaṃ nipajjati, tathā yassā yonimaggo pidahati, sā tattha kammajavātehi aparāparaṃ
analyzed: tiriyam nipajjati tathā yassā yoni maggo pidahati sā tattha kamma ja vātehi apara aparam

original: parivattamānā byākulā mūḷhagabbhāti vuccati, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “gabbhamūḷha”nti.
analyzed: parivattamānā byākulā mūḷhagabbhā iti vuccati tam sandhāya vuttam gabbha mūḷham ti

original: Saccakiriyā nāma buddhāsayaṃ attano sīlaṃ paccavekkhitvā katā, tasmā saccakiriyā
analyzed: saccakiriyā nāma buddha asayam attano sīlam paccavekkhitvā katā tasmai saccakiriyā

original: vejjakammaṃ na hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Therassapi cātiādinā upasaṅkamitabbakāraṇaṃ vadati.
analyzed: vejja kammam na hoti iti daṭṭhabbam therassa api ca ati ādinā upasaṅkamitabba kāraṇam vadati

original: Ime dve hetū paṭicca bhagavā theraṃ saccakiriyaṃ kāresi. Jātinti mūlajātiṃ.
analyzed: ime dve hetū paṭicca bhagavā theram saccakiriyam kāresi mūla jātim

original: 352. Pariyādāya āhacca bhinnena sīsena. Sabhāgadiṭṭhadhammavedanīyakammanti niraye
analyzed: pariyādāya āhacca bhinnena sīsena sa bhāga diṭṭha dhamma vedanīya kammanti niraye

original: nibbattanasakakammasabhāgabhūtaṃ diṭṭhadhammavedanīyakammaṃ. Sabhāgatā ca samānavatthukatā
analyzed: nibbattana saka kamma sabhāga bhūtam diṭṭhadhamma vedanīya kammam sabhāga tā ca samāna vatthuka tā

original: samānārammaṇatāekavīthipariyāpannatādivasena sabbathā sarikkhatā, sadisampi ca nāma
analyzed: samāna ārammaṇa tā eka vīthi pariyāpanna tā ādi vasena sabbathā sa rikkha tā sadisam pi ca nāma

original: tadevāharīyati yathā “tasseva kammassa vipāko”ti ca “sā eva tittirī tāneva osadhānī”ti
analyzed: tat eva āharīyati yathā tassa iva kammassa ca sā eva tittirī tān eva osadhāni iti

original: ca. Idāni tameva sabhāgataṃ dassetuṃ “kammaṃ hī”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Kariyamānamevāti
analyzed: ca idāni tam eva sabhā gatam dassetum kammam hi itiādi āraddham kariyamānam eva ati

original: paccayasamavāyena paṭipāṭiyā nibbattiyamānameva. Tayo koṭṭhāse pūreti, diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaaparāpariyāyavedanīyaupapajjavedanīyasaṅkhāte
analyzed: paccaya samavāyena paṭipāṭiyā nibbattiyamānam eva tayo koṭṭhāse pūreti diṭṭhadhamma vedanīya apara apariyāya vedanīya upapajja vedanīya saṅkhāte

original: tayo bhāge pūreti, tesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ bhāgānaṃ vasena pavattati.
analyzed: tayaḥ bhāge pūreti tesam tiṇṇam bhāgānam vasena pavattati

original: Diṭṭhadhammo vuccati paccakkhabhūto paccuppanno attabhāvo, tattha veditabbaphalaṃ
analyzed: diṭṭhadhammo vuccati paccakkha bhūto paccuppannaḥ attabhāvo tattha veditabba phalam

original: kammaṃ diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ. Paccuppannabhavato anantaraṃ veditabbaphalaṃ kammaṃ
analyzed: kammam diṭṭhadhamma vedanīyam paccuppanna bhavataḥ anantaram veditabba phalam kammam

analyzed: upapajja vedanīyam diṭṭha dhamma anantara bhavataḥ aññasmin atta bhāva pariyāye atta bhāva parivatte

analyzed: veditabba phalam kammam apara apariyāya vedanīyam paṭipakkhehi anabhibhūta tāya paccaya visesena

original: paṭiladdhavisesatāya ca balavabhāvappattā tādisassa pubbābhisaṅkhārassa vasena sātisayā
analyzed: paṭiladdha visesa tāya ca balava bhāva ppattā tādisassa pubba abhisaṅkhārassa vasena sa atisayā

original: hutvā pavattā paṭhamajavanacetanā tasmiṃyeva attabhāve phaladāyinī diṭṭhadhammavedanīyā
analyzed: hutvā pavattā paṭhama javana cetanā tasmin yeva atta bhāve phala dāyinī diṭṭhadhamma vedanīyā

analyzed: nāma sā hi vuttā ākārena balavati javana santāne guṇa visesa yuttesu upakāra anupakāra vasa ppavattiyā

original: āsevanālābhena appavipākatāya ca itaradvayaṃ viya pavattasantānuparamāpekkhaṃ okāsalābhāpekkhañca
analyzed: āsevana alābhena appa vipāka tāya ca itara dvayam viya pavatta santa anuparama apekkham okāsa lābha apekkham ca

original: kammaṃ na hotīti idheva pupphamattaṃ viya pavattivipākamattaṃ phalaṃ deti.
analyzed: kammam na hoti iti idha iva puppha mattam viya pavatti vipāka mattam phalam deti

original: Tathā asakkontanti kammassa phaladānaṃ nāma upadhipayogādipaccayantarasamavāyeneva
analyzed: tathā asakkontanti kammassa phala dānam nāma upadhi payoga ādi paccaya ntara samavāyena iva

original: hotīti tadabhāvato tasmiṃyeva attabhāve vipākaṃ dātuṃ asakkontaṃ. Ahosikammanti kammaṃyeva
analyzed: hoti iti tad abhāvataḥ tasmin yeva atta bhāve vipākam dātum a sakkontam kammaṃyeva

original: ahosi, na tassa vipāko ahosi, atthi bhavissati vāti evaṃ vattabbaṃ kammaṃ. Atthasādhikāti
analyzed: ahosi na tassa vipākaḥ ahosi atthi bhavissati vā ti evam vattabbam kammam attha sādhikā ti

original: dānādipāṇātipātādiatthassa nipphādikā. Kā pana sāti āha “sattamajavanacetanā”ti.
analyzed: dāna ādi pāṇātipāta ādi atthassa nipphādikā kā pana sā ati āha sattama javana cetanā iti

original: Sā hi sanniṭṭhāpakacetanā vuttanayena paṭiladdhavisesā purimajavanacetanāhi laddhāsevanā
analyzed: sā hi sanniṭṭhāpaka cetanā vutta nayena paṭiladdha visesā purima javana cetanāhi laddha āsevanā

original: ca samānā anantare attabhāve vipākadāyinī upapajjavedanīyakammaṃ nāma. Tenāha “anantare
analyzed: ca samānā anantare atta bhāve vipāka dāyinī upapajjavedanīya kammam nāma tena āha anantare

original: attabhāve vipākaṃ detī”ti. Sati saṃsārappavattiyāti iminā asati saṃsārappavattiyā
analyzed: atta bhāve vipākam deti iti sati saṃsāra ppavattiyā ati iminā asati saṃsāra ppavattiyā

original: Samugghāṭitāni vipaccanokāsassa anuppattidhammatāpādanena. Diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ
analyzed: samugghāṭitāni vipacca nokāsassa an uppatti dhamma tā āpādanena diṭṭhadhamma vedanīyam

analyzed: atthi vipāka araha abhāvassa a nibbattita ttā vipacca nokāsassa an upacchinna ttā kata upacitam hi

original: vuttanti āha “yādisassa kho”ti.
analyzed: vuttanti āha yādisassa kho ti

original: Pamādakilesavimuttoti pamādahetukehi sabbehi kilesehi vimutto.
analyzed: pamāda kilesa vimuttaḥ ti pamāda hetukehi sabbehi kilesehi vimuttaḥ

original: Pāpassa pidhānaṃ nāma avipākadhammatāpādananti āha “appaṭisandhikaṃ karīyatī”ti.
analyzed: pāpassa pidhānam nāma a vipāka dhamma tā āpādananti āha appaṭisandhikam karīyati iti

original: Buddhasāsaneti sikkhāttayasaṅgahe buddhassa bhagavato sāsane. Yuttappayutto viharatīti

analyzed: a kattabbassa a karaṇa vasena kattabbassa ca paripūraṇa vasena pavattati

original: Dissanti kujjhantīti disā, paṭipakkhāti āha “sapattā”ti. Tappasaṃsapakāranti mettānisaṃsakittanākāraṃ.
analyzed: dissanti kujjhanti iti disā paṭipakkhā ti āha sa pattā ati tad pasaṃsa pakāram ti mettā nisaṃsa kittana ākāram

original: Kālenāti āmeḍitalopena niddesoti āha “khaṇe khaṇe”ti. Anukarontūti yesaṃ kalyāṇamittānaṃ

analyzed: santike suṇanti yathāsutam dhammam tesam anukarontu diṭṭha anugati karaṇam āpajjantu

analyzed: attanaḥ veri puggalānam pi bhagavato santike dhammassavanam sammāpaṭipattiñca paccāsīsati

original: Tasanti gatiṃ patthayantīti tasā bhavantarādīsu saṃsaraṇabhāvato. Tenāha “tasā vuccanti sataṇhā”ti.
analyzed: tasanti gatim patthayanti iti tasāḥ bhavantara ādīsu saṃsaraṇa bhāvato tena āha tasāḥ vuccanti sa taṇhā ti

original: Netabbaṭṭhānaṃ udakaṃ nayantīti nettikā. Bandhitvāti daḷhaṃ bandhitvā. Telakañjikenāti telamissitena kañjikena.
analyzed: netabba ṭṭhānam udakam nayanti iti nettikāḥ bandhitvā ati daḷham bandhitvā tela kañjikena ati tela missitena kañjikena

original: Yādisova aniṭṭhe, tādisova iṭṭheti iṭṭhāniṭṭhe nibbikārena tādī. Yesaṃ pana kāmāmisādīnaṃ
analyzed: yādiso uva aniṭṭhe tādiso uva iṭṭhe iti iṭṭha aniṭṭhe nibbikārena yesam pana kāma āmisa ādīnam

analyzed: tādī yehi anañña sādhāraṇehi sīla ādi guṇehi samannāgata ttā bhagavā ta ādi bhāvena ukkaṃsa pārami ppatto

original: taṃniddeso, tehi guṇehi yāthāvato niddisitabbatopi tādī. Yathā yantarajjuyā yantaṃ
analyzed: taṃ niddesaḥ tehi guṇehi yāthāvataḥ tādī yathā yanta rajjuyā yantam

original: nīyati, evaṃ yāya taṇhāya bhavo nīyati, sā “bhavanetti bhavarajjū”ti vuttā. Tenāha
analyzed: nīyati evam yāya taṇhāya bhavaḥ nīyati sā bhavanā itti bhava rajjū iti vuttā tena āha

original: “tāya hī”tiādi, kammāni kusalādīni vipaccayanti apaccayanti etāyāti kammavipāko.
analyzed: tāya hi itiādi kammāni kusala ādīni vipaccayanti apaccayanti etāya ati kamma vipāko

original: Apaccayabhāvo nāma ariyamaggacetanāyāti āha “maggacetanāyā”ti. Yāva na kilesā pahīyanti,
analyzed: apaccaya bhāvaḥ nāma ariya magga cetanāya ati āha magga cetanāya ati yāva na kilesā pahīyanti

original: tāva ime sattā saiṇā eva aserivihārabhāvatoti āha “aṇaṇo nikkileso jāto”ti.

original: Theyyaparibhogo nāma sāmiparibhogābhāvato. Bhagavatāpi hi attano sāsane sīlavato
analyzed: theyya paribhogaḥ nāma sāmi paribhoga abhāvataḥ bhagavatā api hi attano sāsane

original: paccayā anuññātā, na dussīlassa, dāyakānaṃ sīlavatoyeva pariccāgo, na dussīlassa
analyzed: paccayāḥ anuññātāḥ na dussīlassa dāyakānam sīlavato yeva pariccāgaḥ na dussīlassa

original: attano kārānaṃ mahapphalabhāvassa paccāsīsanato. Iti satthārā ananuññātattā dāyakehi
analyzed: attano kārānam mahapphala bhāvassa paccāsīsanato iti satthārā an anuññāta ttā dāyakehi

original: ca apariccattattā “dussīlassa paribhogo theyyaparibhogo nāmā”ti vuttaṃ. Iṇavasena
analyzed: ca a pariccatta ttā dussīlassa paribhogaḥ theyya paribhogaḥ nāma ati vuttam iṇa vasena

original: paribhogo iṇaparibhogo. Paṭiggāhakato dakkhiṇāvisuddhiyā abhāvato iṇaṃ gahetvā paribhogo
analyzed: paribhogaḥ iṇa paribhogaḥ paṭiggāhakataḥ dakkhiṇā visuddhiyāḥ abhāvataḥ iṇam gahetvā paribhogaḥ

original: viyāti attho. Yasmā sekkhā bhagavato orasaputtā, tasmā te pitusantakānaṃ paccayānaṃ
analyzed: viya ati atthaḥ yasmā sekkhā bhagavataḥ orasa puttā tasmā te pitu santakānam

analyzed: dāyādāḥ hutvā te paccaye paribhuñjanti iti tesam paribhogaḥ dāyajja paribhogaḥ nāma kim

original: pana te bhagavato paccaye paribhuñjanti, udāhu gihīhi dinnanti? Gihīhi dinnāpi te

original: atinīcaṃ uparūpari sandhāretuṃ appahontato.
